trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" /> 已令 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 處於接聽狀態，或者非同步作業已在進行中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: The port number of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the connect operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含連線作業資訊的使用者定義物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>requestCallback</c> delegate when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>requestCallback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request for a remote host connection.
trans-unit.target: 開始遠端主機連接的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The host is specified by an <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> and a port number.
trans-unit.target: 此主機是由 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> 和連接埠號碼所指定。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous connection.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步連接的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndConnect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>作業必須完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndConnect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`requestCallback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation is complete, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method overloads, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndConnect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法多載，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndConnect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To cancel a pending call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> method, close the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消暫止呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法，關閉<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>非同步作業正在進行時呼叫方法時，回呼提供給<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A subsequent call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndConnect%2A> method will throw an <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> to indicate that the operation has been cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 後續呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndConnect%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>來指出已取消作業。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: If this socket has previously been disconnected, then <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> must be called on a thread that will not exit until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果此通訊端先前已中斷連線，然後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>必須在作業完成之前，不會結束執行緒上呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This is a limitation of the underlying provider.
trans-unit.target: 這是基礎提供者的限制。

trans-unit.source: Also the <xref:System.Net.EndPoint> that is used must be different.
trans-unit.target: 也<xref:System.Net.EndPoint>也就是使用必須不同。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: This method is valid for sockets in the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> or <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> families.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法對 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> 系列通訊端是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The port number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠號碼無效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been placed in a listening state by calling <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" />, or an asynchronous operation is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" /> 已令 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 處於接聽狀態，或者非同步作業已在進行中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this socket can be reused after the connection is closed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個通訊端可以在關閉連接後重複使用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含這個要求的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request to disconnect from a remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步要求，以中斷遠端端點的連接。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，參考非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect%2A> method to request a disconnect from a remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect%2A>方法，以從遠端端點要求中斷連接。

trans-unit.source: If `reuseSocket` is `true`, you can reuse the socket.
trans-unit.target: 如果`reuseSocket`是`true`，您可以重複使用的通訊端。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect%2A> method uses a separate thread to invoke the specified callback method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect%2A>方法使用另一個執行緒來叫用指定的回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndDisconnect%2A> method blocks until the pending disconnect is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndDisconnect%2A>方法會封鎖直到暫止的中斷連線已完成。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理做為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> exception, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>例外狀況，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a socket for asynchronous communication and sends some data to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立通訊端的非同步通訊，並將部分資料傳送至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: When the data has been sent, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> is called to stop the send and receive activity.
trans-unit.target: 當已傳送資料時，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>呼叫來停止傳送和接收活動。

trans-unit.source: Then <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect%2A> is called to begin a disconnect request.
trans-unit.target: 然後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect%2A>呼叫來開始中斷連線要求。

trans-unit.source: When the request completes, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A> property is queried to test whether the socket is disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 當要求完成時，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A>屬性會查詢以測試是否已中斷連線通訊端。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is Windows 2000 or earlier, and this method requires Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統是 Windows 2000 (含) 以前版本，但這個方法需要的是 Windows XP。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />物件已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Begins to asynchronously receive data from a connected <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 開始從已連接的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 非同步接收資料。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that is the storage location for the received data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，為收到資料的存放位置。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於作業完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的物件，包含接收作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive(System.IAsyncResult)" /> delegate when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時會將這個物件傳遞至 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Begins to asynchronously receive data from a connected <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 開始從已連接的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 非同步接收資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步讀取的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A> operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>作業必須完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`callback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation is complete, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: To cancel a pending <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消暫止<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits.
trans-unit.target: 該執行緒結束時，會取消給定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。

trans-unit.source: A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: `state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class.
trans-unit.target: `state` 是使用者定義的具現化。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: `state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class.
trans-unit.target: `state` 是使用者定義的具現化。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.source: The following code example begins to asynchronously receive data from a connected <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開始以非同步方式接收的資料連接<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is less than 0.

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" /> minus the value of the <paramref name="offset" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度減去 <paramref name="offset" /> 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that is the storage location for the received data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，為收到資料的存放位置。

trans-unit.source: The location in <c>buffer</c> to store the received data.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中存放已接收資料的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to receive.
trans-unit.target: 要接收的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於作業完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的物件，包含接收作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive(System.IAsyncResult)" /> delegate when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時會將這個物件傳遞至 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Begins to asynchronously receive data from a connected <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 開始從已連接的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 非同步接收資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步讀取的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A> operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>作業必須完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`callback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation is complete, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: To cancel a pending <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消暫止<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits.
trans-unit.target: 該執行緒結束時，會取消給定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。

trans-unit.source: A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。

trans-unit.target: `state` 是使用者定義的具現化。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

<paramref name="size" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" /> minus the value of the <paramref name="offset" /> parameter.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the <c>buffer</c> parameter at which to store the data.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含這個要求的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Begins to asynchronously receive data from a specified network device.
trans-unit.target: 開始從指定的網路裝置非同步接收資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步讀取的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method starts asynchronously reading connectionless datagrams from a remote host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法開始非同步讀取從遠端主機的 無連接的資料包。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method gives you the ability to receive data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法可讓您接收不同的執行緒中的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立實作的回呼方法<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派，並將其名稱傳遞<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> being used for communication.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，在非常小，您`state`參數必須包含已連接，或預設<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>正在使用的通訊。

trans-unit.source: If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and the other required information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的回呼需要詳細資訊，您可以建立可保留的小型類別<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>以及其他必要的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Pass an instance of this class to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法，透過`state`參數。

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should invoke the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 叫用回呼方法應該<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When your application calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>, the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and it will block on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A> until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> reads data or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>，系統會使用另一個執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，它會封鎖在<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>直到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>擲回例外狀況或讀取資料。

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method, use <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要封鎖您呼叫之後，原始執行緒<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法，請使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要繼續執行原始的執行緒時，請在 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 在回呼方法上呼叫 Set 方法。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理做為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>, you must explicitly bind the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to a local endpoint using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>，您必須明確繫結<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>本機端點使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data is sent.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讀取資料到`buffer`參數，以及擷取遠端裝載傳送資料的端點。

trans-unit.source: For information on how to retrieve this endpoint, refer to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何擷取此端點資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is most useful if you intend to asynchronously receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是最有用，如果您想要以非同步方式接收來自未知的主機或多部主機的 無連接的資料包。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> will read the first enqueued datagram received into the local network buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>會讀取第一個收到的區域網路緩衝區中的加入佇列資料包。

trans-unit.source: If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of `buffer`, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method will fill `buffer` with as much of the message as is possible, and throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您接收的資料包大於大小`buffer`、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法將會填滿`buffer`一樣多的訊息是盡可能，，並擲回與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you are using an unreliable protocol, the excess data will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的不可靠的通訊協定，將會遺失過多的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a reliable protocol, the excess data will be retained by the service provider and you can retrieve it by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method with a large enough buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用可靠的通訊協定、 過多的資料會保留服務提供者，而且您可以呼叫來擷取<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法夠大的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee that the remote host endpoint is always returned, an application should explicitly bind the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to a local endpoint using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method and then call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method with the `optionLevel` parameter set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel.IP> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel.IPv6> as appropriate, the `optionName` parameter set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.PacketInformation>, and the `optionValue` parameter to enable this option before calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證，應用程式應該明確繫結遠端主機端點便會永遠傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>本機端點使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>方法`optionLevel`參數設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel.IP>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel.IPv6>適時`optionName`參數設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.PacketInformation>，而`optionValue`參數以啟用此選項，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is possible for the remote host endpoint to not be returned when the sender has sent a number of datagrams before the receiver has called the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，便可將不會傳回當寄件者已傳送的資料包的數字之前已呼叫收件者, 的遠端主機端點<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> is intended for connectionless protocols, you can use a connection-oriented protocol as well.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>適用於無連接的通訊協定，您可以使用連線導向的通訊協定以及。

trans-unit.source: If you choose to do so, you must first either establish a remote host connection by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> / <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> method or accept an incoming connection request by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇這樣做，您必須先請建立遠端主機連接藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> / <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法，或藉由呼叫接受連入連線要求<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method before establishing or accepting a connection, you will get a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法，然後再建立或接受連線，您會收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立無連接的通訊協定，然後才會呼叫預設遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In either of these cases, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only receive data from the connected or default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情況下，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法將會忽略`remoteEP`參數，只接收來自已連接的資料或預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: With connection-oriented sockets, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> will read as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用連線導向的通訊端<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>會讀取位於最高達指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數。

trans-unit.source: To cancel a pending <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消暫止<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.source: The following code example asynchronously receives connectionless datagrams from a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會從遠端主機，以非同步方式接收無連接的資料包。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="remoteEP" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteEP" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" /> minus the value of the <paramref name="offset" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度減去 <paramref name="offset" /> 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have permission for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫堆疊中位置較高的呼叫端對於要求的作業沒有權限。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that is the storage location for the received data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，為收到資料的存放位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the <c>buffer</c> parameter at which to store the data.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>參數中要儲存資料的以零起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to receive.
trans-unit.target: 要接收的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> that represents the source of the data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" />，表示資料的來源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含這個要求的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Begins to asynchronously receive the specified number of bytes of data into the specified location of the data buffer, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" />, and stores the endpoint and packet information..
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" />，開始以非同步方式接收指定之位元組數目的資料至資料緩衝區的指定位置，並儲存端點和封包資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步讀取的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous receive operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步接收作業必須完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖的作業完成之前，請使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To cancel a pending <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveMessageFrom%2A>, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消暫止<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveMessageFrom%2A>，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

trans-unit.source: This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data is sent, as well as information about the received packet.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讀取資料到`buffer`參數，和擷取遠端裝載的端點從中傳送資料，以及收到的封包的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: For information on how to retrieve this endpoint, refer to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何擷取此端點資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is most useful if you intend to asynchronously receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是最有用，如果您想要以非同步方式接收來自未知的主機或多部主機的 無連接的資料包。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="remoteEP" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteEP" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度減去 <paramref name="offset" /> 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is Windows 2000 or earlier, and this method requires Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統是 Windows 2000 (含) 以前版本，但這個方法需要的是 Windows XP。

trans-unit.source: Sends data asynchronously to a connected <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 非同步傳送資料至已連接的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the data to send.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，包含要傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含這個要求的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sends data asynchronously to a connected <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 非同步傳送資料至已連接的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步傳送的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中建立遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> will throw an exception if you do not first call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> 如果您不先呼叫會擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法可讓您傳送不同的執行緒中的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立實作的回呼方法<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派，並將其名稱傳遞<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> being used for communication.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，在非常小，您`state`參數必須包含已連接，或預設<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>正在使用的通訊。

trans-unit.source: If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and the other required information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的回呼需要詳細資訊，您可以建立小型類別或結構來保留<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>以及其他必要的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Pass an instance of this class to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法，透過`state`參數。

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should invoke the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 叫用回呼方法應該<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When your application calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>, the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>，系統將使用不同的執行緒執行指定的回呼方法，並會封鎖<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>直到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>傳送要求的位元組數目，或擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要封鎖您呼叫之後，原始執行緒<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法，請使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要繼續執行原始的執行緒時，請在 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 在回呼方法上呼叫 Set 方法。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理做為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。

trans-unit.source: Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> method to establish a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 雖然適合連線導向的通訊協定，但<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>也適用於無連接的通訊協定，前提是您第一次呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法，以建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定和計劃將資料傳送到數個不同的主機，您應該使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: It is okay to use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> even after you have established a default remote host with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 還是可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>即使您已建立的預設遠端主機之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can also change the default remote host prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> by making another call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以變更預設遠端主機，然後才呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>藉由另一個呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須確定您的緩衝區大小不會超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包無連接的通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: If it does, the datagram will not be sent and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，將不會傳送資料包和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.DontRoute> flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.DontRoute>旗標標示為`socketflags`參數，將不會路由傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits.
trans-unit.target: 該執行緒結束時，會取消給定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。

trans-unit.source: A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: `state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class.
trans-unit.target: `state` 是使用者定義的具現化。

trans-unit.source: The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.
trans-unit.target: 傳送成功完成並不表示已成功傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有緩衝區空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統中，除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffers" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffers" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffers" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffers" /> 是空的。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See remarks section below.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱以下註解章節。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the data to send.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，包含要傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError" /> object that stores the socket error.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError" /> 物件，儲存通訊端錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含這個要求的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sends data asynchronously to a connected <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 非同步傳送資料至已連接的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步傳送的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中建立遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> will throw an exception if you do not first call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> 如果您不先呼叫會擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法可讓您傳送不同的執行緒中的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立實作的回呼方法<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派，並將其名稱傳遞<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> being used for communication.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，在非常小，您`state`參數必須包含已連接，或預設<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>正在使用的通訊。

trans-unit.source: If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and the other required information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的回呼需要詳細資訊，您可以建立小型類別或結構來保留<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>以及其他必要的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Pass an instance of this class to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法，透過`state`參數。

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should invoke the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 叫用回呼方法應該<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When your application calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>, the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>，系統將使用不同的執行緒執行指定的回呼方法，並會封鎖<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>直到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>傳送要求的位元組數目，或擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要封鎖您呼叫之後，原始執行緒<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法，請使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the Set method on a <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent> in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: 在上呼叫 Set 方法<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent>在回呼方法，當您想要繼續執行原始的執行緒時。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理做為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。

trans-unit.source: Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> method to establish a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 雖然適合連線導向的通訊協定，但<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>也適用於無連接的通訊協定，前提是您第一次呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法，以建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定和計劃將資料傳送到數個不同的主機，您應該使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: It is okay to use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> even after you have established a default remote host with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 還是可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>即使您已建立的預設遠端主機之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can also change the default remote host prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> by making another call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以變更預設遠端主機，然後才呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>藉由另一個呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須確定您的緩衝區大小不會超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包無連接的通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: If it does, the datagram will not be sent and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，將不會傳送資料包和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.DontRoute> flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.DontRoute>旗標標示為`socketflags`參數，將不會路由傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits.
trans-unit.target: 該執行緒結束時，會取消給定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。

trans-unit.source: A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: `state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class.
trans-unit.target: `state` 是使用者定義的具現化。

trans-unit.source: The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.
trans-unit.target: 傳送成功完成並不表示已成功傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有緩衝區空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統中，除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.target: 還是可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>即使您已建立的預設遠端主機之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須確定您的緩衝區大小不會超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包無連接的通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: If it does, the datagram will not be sent and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，將不會傳送資料包和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.DontRoute> flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.DontRoute>旗標標示為`socketflags`參數，將不會路由傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits.
trans-unit.target: 該執行緒結束時，會取消給定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。

trans-unit.source: A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: `state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class.
trans-unit.target: `state` 是使用者定義的具現化。

trans-unit.source: The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.
trans-unit.target: 傳送成功完成並不表示已成功傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有緩衝區空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統中，除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See remarks section below.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱以下註解章節。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> is less than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" /> minus the value of the <paramref name="offset" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度減去 <paramref name="offset" /> 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the data to send.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，包含要傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the <c>buffer</c> parameter at which to begin sending data.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>參數中要開始傳送資料的以零起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to send.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含這個要求的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sends data asynchronously to a connected <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 非同步傳送資料至已連接的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步傳送的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中建立遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> will throw an exception if you do not first call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> 如果您不先呼叫會擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法可讓您傳送不同的執行緒中的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立實作的回呼方法<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派，並將其名稱傳遞<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> being used for communication.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，在非常小，您`state`參數必須包含已連接，或預設<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>正在使用的通訊。

trans-unit.source: If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and the other required information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的回呼需要詳細資訊，您可以建立小型類別或結構來保留<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>以及其他必要的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Pass an instance of this class to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法，透過`state`參數。

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should invoke the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 叫用回呼方法應該<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When your application calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>, the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>，系統將使用不同的執行緒執行指定的回呼方法，並會封鎖<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>直到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>傳送要求的位元組數目，或擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要封鎖您呼叫之後，原始執行緒<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法，請使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要繼續執行原始的執行緒時，請在 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 在回呼方法上呼叫 Set 方法。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理做為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。

trans-unit.source: Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> method to establish a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 雖然適合連線導向的通訊協定，但<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>也適用於無連接的通訊協定，前提是您第一次呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法，以建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定和計劃將資料傳送到數個不同的主機，您應該使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: It is okay to use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> even after you have established a default remote host with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 還是可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>即使您已建立的預設遠端主機之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can also change the default remote host prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> by making another call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以變更預設遠端主機，然後才呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>藉由另一個呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須確定您的緩衝區大小不會超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包無連接的通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: If it does, the datagram will not be sent and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，將不會傳送資料包和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.DontRoute> flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.DontRoute>旗標標示為`socketflags`參數，將不會路由傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits.
trans-unit.target: 該執行緒結束時，會取消給定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。

trans-unit.source: A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: `state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class.
trans-unit.target: `state` 是使用者定義的具現化。

trans-unit.source: The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.
trans-unit.target: 傳送成功完成並不表示已成功傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有緩衝區空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統中，除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.source: The following code example begins asynchronously sending data to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開始以非同步方式將資料傳送至遠端主機。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See remarks section below.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱以下註解章節。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> is less than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is less than 0.
