<paramref name="size" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" /> minus the value of the <paramref name="offset" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度減去 <paramref name="offset" /> 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Sends a file asynchronously to a connected <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案以非同步方式傳送至已連接的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path and name of the file to send.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要傳送之檔案的路徑和名稱。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含這個要求的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sends the file <paramref name="fileName" /> to a connected <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object using the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.UseDefaultWorkerThread" /> flag.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 旗標，將檔案 <paramref name="fileName" /> 傳送至已連接的 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions.UseDefaultWorkerThread" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that represents the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，表示非同步傳送。

trans-unit.source: This overload sends the file `fileName` to the connected socket.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會將該檔案傳送`fileName`連線通訊端。

trans-unit.source: If `fileName` is in the local directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fileName`是在本機目錄中，它可能會用來識別檔案的名稱; 否則必須指定完整路徑和檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported.
trans-unit.target: 使用萬用字元 (「...\\\myfile.txt") 和 UNC 共用名稱 ("\\\\\\\shared 目錄\\\myfile.txt 」) 支援。

trans-unit.source: If the file is not found, the exception <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案找不到，例外狀況<xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用`TransmitFile`函式位於 Windows Sockets 2 API。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the Windows Sockets documentation in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`TransmitFile`函式和其旗標，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Sockets 文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>,<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中建立遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> throws an exception if you do not first call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> 擲回例外狀況，如果您不先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> method enables you to send a file within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>方法可讓您傳送不同的執行緒中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: To complete the operation, you can create a callback method that is invoked by the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成此作業，您可以建立所叫用回呼方法<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派參數。

trans-unit.source: To do this, at the very minimum, the `state` parameter must contain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> object being used for communication.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請在最起碼`state`參數必須包含<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>物件正在使用的通訊。

trans-unit.source: If your callback needs more information, you can create a class or structure to hold the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and the other required information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的回呼需要詳細資訊，您可以建立類別或結構來保留<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>以及其他必要的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Pass an instance of this custom object to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至這個自訂物件的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>方法，透過`state`參數。

trans-unit.source: Your callback method must invoke the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 叫用回呼方法必須<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When your application calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>, the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends the entire file or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>，系統會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，並封鎖<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A>直到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>傳送整個檔案，或擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理做為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。

trans-unit.source: Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> method to establish a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 雖然適合連線導向的通訊協定，但<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>也適用於無連接的通訊協定，前提是您第一次呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法，以建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: With connectionless protocols, you must be sure that the size of your file does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider.
trans-unit.target: 無連接的通訊協定，您必須確定檔案的大小不會超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包。

trans-unit.source: If it does, the datagram is not sent and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> throws a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，不會傳送資料包和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> exception, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>例外狀況，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and connects a socket for asynchronous communication.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立，並連接的非同步通訊的通訊端。

trans-unit.source: First, the file "text.txt" is sent asynchronously to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 首先，「 text.txt"的檔案會非同步地傳送至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The callback delegate calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> to complete the transmission.
trans-unit.target: 委派會呼叫回呼<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A>完成傳輸。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />物件已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The socket is not connected to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 通訊端未連線至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The file <paramref name="fileName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案 <paramref name="fileName" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See remarks section below.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱以下註解章節。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path and name of the file to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要傳送之檔案的路徑和名稱。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains data to be sent before the file is sent.
trans-unit.target: 包含傳送檔案前要傳送之資料的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains data to be sent after the file is sent.
trans-unit.target: 包含傳送檔案後要傳送之資料的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate to be invoked when this operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 這個作業完成時要叫用的 <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的物件，包含這個要求的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends a file and buffers of data asynchronously to a connected <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案和資料緩衝區以非同步方式傳送至已連接的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: This overload requires the name of the file you want to send and a bitwise combination of <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions> values.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載都需要您想要傳送的檔案和的位元組合名稱<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions>值。

trans-unit.source: The `preBuffer` parameter contains any data you want to precede the file.
trans-unit.target: `preBuffer`參數會包含您想要位在檔案之前的任何資料。

trans-unit.source: `postBuffer` contains data you want to follow the file.
trans-unit.target: `postBuffer` 包含您想要遵循之檔案的資料。

trans-unit.source: If `fileName` is in the local directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fileName`是在本機目錄中，它可能會用來識別檔案的名稱; 否則必須指定完整路徑和檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported.
trans-unit.target: 使用萬用字元 (「...\\\myfile.txt") 和 UNC 共用名稱 ("\\\\\\\shared 目錄\\\myfile.txt 」) 支援。

trans-unit.source: If the file is not found, the exception <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案找不到，例外狀況<xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The `flags` parameter provides the Window Sockets service provider with additional information about the file transfer.
trans-unit.target: `flags`參數提供視窗通訊端服務提供者，以及其他資訊的檔案傳輸。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use this parameter, see <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何使用這個參數的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions>。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用`TransmitFile`函式位於 Windows Sockets 2 API。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the Windows Sockets documentation in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`TransmitFile`函式和其旗標，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Sockets 文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中建立遠端主機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> throws an exception if you do not first call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> 擲回例外狀況，如果您不先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> method gives you the ability to send a file within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>方法可讓您傳送不同的執行緒中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: To complete the operation, you can create a callback method that is invoked by the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成此作業，您可以建立所叫用回呼方法<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派參數。

trans-unit.source: To do this, at the very minimum, the `state` parameter must contain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> object being used for communication.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請在最起碼`state`參數必須包含<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>物件正在使用的通訊。

trans-unit.source: If your callback needs more information, you can create a class or structure to hold the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and the other required information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的回呼需要詳細資訊，您可以建立類別或結構來保留<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>以及其他必要的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Pass an instance of this custom object to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至這個自訂物件的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>方法，透過`state`參數。

trans-unit.source: Your callback method must invoke the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 叫用回呼方法必須<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When your application calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>, the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends the entire file or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>，系統會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，並封鎖<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A>直到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>傳送整個檔案，或擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理做為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。

trans-unit.source: Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> method to establish a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 雖然適合連線導向的通訊協定，但<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>也適用於無連接的通訊協定，前提是您第一次呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法，以建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your file does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須確定檔案的大小不超過最大的封包大小基礎的服務提供者的無連接的通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: If it does, the datagram is not sent and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> throws a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，不會傳送資料包和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> exception, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>例外狀況，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and connects a socket for asynchronous communication and begins sending the file "text.txt" asynchronously to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立連接的非同步通訊的通訊端並開始以非同步方式至遠端主機傳送檔案"text.txt"。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a `preBuffer` and a `postBuffer` of data is created to send with the file and the default <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions> value is used.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`preBuffer`和`postBuffer`的資料建立檔案與預設傳送<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TransmitFileOptions>會使用值。

trans-unit.source: The callback delegate calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> to complete the transmission.
trans-unit.target: 委派會呼叫回呼<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A>完成傳輸。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />物件已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See remarks section below.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱以下註解章節。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不是 Windows NT (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The socket is not connected to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 通訊端未連線至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The file <paramref name="fileName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案 <paramref name="fileName" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the data to send.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，包含要傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin sending data.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中以零起始的位置，資料要在此處開始傳送。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to send.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for this request.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含這個要求的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sends data asynchronously to a specific remote host.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式將資料傳送至特定的遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 參考非同步傳送的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host specified in the `remoteEP` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中指定遠端主機`remoteEP`參數。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>方法可讓您傳送不同的執行緒中的資料。

trans-unit.source: Although intended for connectionless protocols, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> works with both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols.
trans-unit.target: 適用於無連接的通訊協定，雖然<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>無連線和連線導向的通訊協定的運作方式。

trans-unit.source: You can create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate and pass its name to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立實作的回呼方法<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派，並將其名稱傳遞<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> being used for communication.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，在非常小，您`state`參數必須包含已連接，或預設<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>正在使用的通訊。

trans-unit.source: If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, and the other required information.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的回呼需要詳細資訊，您可以建立可保留的小型類別<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，以及其他必要的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Pass an instance of this class to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> method through the `state` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>方法，透過`state`參數。

trans-unit.source: Your callback method should invoke the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 叫用回呼方法應該<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When your application calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>, the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A> until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>，系統將使用不同的執行緒執行指定的回呼方法，並會封鎖<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A>直到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>傳送要求的位元組數目，或擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you want the original thread to block after you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要封鎖您呼叫之後，原始執行緒<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>方法，請使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要繼續執行原始的執行緒時，請在 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 在回呼方法上呼叫 Set 方法。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理做為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> method, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and send data to the <xref:System.Net.EndPoint> established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> 將會忽略`remoteEP`參數，並將傳送資料至<xref:System.Net.EndPoint>中建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> method prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您不需要建立預設遠端主機與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法之前呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You only need to do this if you intend to call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要執行這項操作，如果您想要呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you do call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> method prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A>, the `remoteEP` parameter will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法之前呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A>、`remoteEP`參數會覆寫指定的預設遠端主機，如，傳送作業只。

trans-unit.source: You are also not required to call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也不需要呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的本機網路位址和通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to select a free port.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望基礎的服務提供者，選取可用的通訊埠，請使用零的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: If you need to identify the assigned local network address and port number, you can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A> property after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A> method successfully completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要識別指派的本機網路位址和連接埠號碼，您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>屬性之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A>方法成功完成。

trans-unit.source: If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要將資料傳送至廣播位址，您必須先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>方法並將通訊端選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: -You must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider.
trans-unit.target: -您也必須確定您的緩衝區大小不會超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包。

trans-unit.source: If it does, the datagram will not be sent and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果是的話，將不會傳送資料包和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.DontRoute> flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.DontRoute>旗標標示為`socketflags`參數，將不會路由傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> methods.
trans-unit.target: （安全性內容、 模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 的執行內容會快取非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法。

trans-unit.source: After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> method, a specific <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.
trans-unit.target: 在特定內容的第一次使用之後 (特定非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>方法中，特定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>執行個體和指定的回撥)，後續使用該內容會看見效能改進。

trans-unit.source: The following code example asynchronously sends data to the specified remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例以非同步方式將資料傳送至指定的遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="remoteEP" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteEP" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" /> minus the value of the <paramref name="offset" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度減去 <paramref name="offset" /> 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have permission for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫堆疊中位置較高的呼叫端對於要求的作業沒有權限。

trans-unit.source: The local <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> 關聯的本機 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: Associates a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> with a local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 與本機端點建立關聯。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method if you need to use a specific local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法，如果您需要使用特定的本機端點。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> before you can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>才能呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> before using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method unless you need to use a specific local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>之前使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法除非您需要使用特定的本機端點。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method on both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>無連線和連線導向的通訊協定上的方法。

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>, you must first create the local <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> from which you intend to communicate data.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>，您必須先建立本機<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>從您要通訊的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address.
trans-unit.target: 如果您並不在意哪些本機位址指派，您可以建立<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=nameWithType>位址參數，以及基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的網路位址。

trans-unit.source: This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於簡化您的應用程式，如果您有多個網路介面。

trans-unit.source: If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using 0 for the port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您並不在意哪些本機連接埠使用，您可以建立<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用連接埠號碼 0。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，服務提供者會指派可用的通訊埠編號介於 1024年到 5000 之間。

trans-unit.source: If you use the above approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用上述的方法，您可以探索哪些本機網路位址和通訊埠編號已被指派藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A> will not return the locally assigned network address until after you have made a call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndConnect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>之後所做的呼叫，則不會傳回在本機指派的網路位址，直到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndConnect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, you will not have access to this information until you have completed a send or receive.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您不會存取此資訊之前，您已經完成傳送或接收。

trans-unit.source: If a UDP socket wants to receive interface information on received packets, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method should be explicitly called with the socket option set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.PacketInformation> immediately after calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果想要接收介面資訊上收到的封包的 UDP 通訊端<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>通訊端選項設為應該明確地呼叫方法<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.PacketInformation>後立即呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you intend to receive multicast datagrams, you must call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method with a multicast port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要接收多點傳送的資料包，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>多點傳送連接埠號碼的方法。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method if you intend to receive connectionless datagrams using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法，如果您想要接收無連接的資料包使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> when calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>呼叫時<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法，請使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example binds a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> using the specified local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例繫結<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>使用指定的本機端點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="localEP" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="localEP" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have permission for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫堆疊中位置較高的呼叫端對於要求的作業沒有權限。

trans-unit.source: for accepting connections from the host defined by <paramref name="localEP" />.
trans-unit.target: 接受來自所定義的主機連接的<paramref name="localEP" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Accept" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Accept" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is in blocking mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 是否處於區塊模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> will block; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 可區塊化，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A> property indicates whether a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is in blocking mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A>屬性會指出是否<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>處於封鎖模式。

trans-unit.source: If you are in blocking mode, and you make a method call which does not complete immediately, your application will block execution until the requested operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您封鎖模式中，而使方法呼叫它不會立即完成，您的應用程式將會封鎖執行，直到完成要求的作業。

trans-unit.source: If you want execution to continue even though the requested operation is not complete, change the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要繼續，即使未完成要求的作業、 變更執行<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A> property has no effect on asynchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A>屬性具有非同步方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: If you are sending and receiving data asynchronously and want to block execution, use the <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是傳送和接收資料，以非同步方式，而且想要封鎖執行，使用<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent>類別。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> object used to request the connection to the remote host by calling one of the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync(System.Net.Sockets.SocketType,System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType,System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> 物件，藉由呼叫一個 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync(System.Net.Sockets.SocketType,System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType,System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs)" /> 方法來要求與遠端主機連接。

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous request for a remote host connection.
trans-unit.target: 取消遠端主機連接的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.CancelConnectAsync%2A> method cancels an asynchronous request for a remote host connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.CancelConnectAsync%2A>方法會取消遠端主機連接的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter cannot be null and the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint" /> cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數不可為 null，而且 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint" /> 也不可為 null。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have permission for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫堆疊中位置較高的呼叫端對於要求的作業沒有權限。

trans-unit.source: Closes the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> connection and releases all associated resources.
trans-unit.target: 關閉 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 連接並釋放所有相關資源。

trans-unit.source: Closes the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> connection and releases all associated resources.
trans-unit.target: 關閉 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 連接並釋放所有相關資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method closes the remote host connection and releases all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法關閉遠端主機連接，並釋放所有 managed 和 unmanaged 資源相關聯<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Upon closing, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在關閉時<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: For connection-oriented protocols, it is recommended that you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> before calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需連線導向的通訊協定，建議您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>之前先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that all data is sent and received on the connected socket before it is closed.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保所有資料都傳送及接收連線的通訊端上之前它已關閉。

trans-unit.source: If you need to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> without first calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>, you can ensure that data queued for outgoing transmission will be sent by setting the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger><xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> option to `false` and specifying a non-zero time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>情況下先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>，您可以確保資料佇列的傳出傳輸將傳送藉由設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger><xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>選項設定為`false`並指定非零逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> will then block until this data is sent or until the specified time-out expires.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> 然後會封鎖直到這項資料會傳送，或直到指定的逾時過期為止。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger> to `false` and specify a zero time-out interval, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> releases the connection and automatically discards outgoing queued data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger>至`false`並指定為零的逾時間隔，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>釋放連接，並會自動捨棄傳出佇列的資料。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger> socket option to `false`, create a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>, set the enabled property to `true`, and set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A> property to the desired time out period.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger>通訊端選項`false`，建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>，enabled 的屬性設定為`true`，並設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>屬性所需的逾時期間。

trans-unit.source: Use this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption> along with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger> socket option to call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>連同<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger>通訊端選項來呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example closes a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會關閉<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Wait up to <c>timeout</c> seconds to send any remaining data, then close the socket.
trans-unit.target: 最多等候 <c>timeout</c> 秒以傳送任何剩餘的資料，然後關閉通訊端。

trans-unit.source: Closes the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> connection and releases all associated resources with a specified timeout to allow queued data to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 關閉 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 連線，並釋放所有具指定逾時的關聯資源，以允許傳送佇列的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method closes the remote host connection and releases all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法關閉遠端主機連接，並釋放所有 managed 和 unmanaged 資源相關聯<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Upon closing, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在關閉時<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: For connection-oriented protocols, it is recommended that you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需連線導向的通訊協定，建議您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>之前先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that all data is sent and received on the connected socket before it is closed.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保所有資料都傳送及接收連線的通訊端上之前它已關閉。

trans-unit.source: If you need to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> without first calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>, you can ensure that data queued for outgoing transmission will be sent by setting the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger> option to `false` and specifying a non-zero time-out interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>情況下先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>，您可以確保資料佇列的傳出傳輸將傳送藉由設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger>選項設定為`false`並指定非零逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> will then block until this data is sent or until the specified time-out expires.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> 然後會封鎖直到這項資料會傳送，或直到指定的逾時過期為止。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger> to `false` and specify a zero time-out interval, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> releases the connection and automatically discards outgoing queued data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger>至`false`並指定為零的逾時間隔，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>釋放連接，並會自動捨棄傳出佇列的資料。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger> socket option to `false`, create a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>, set the enabled property to `true`, and set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A> property to the desired time-out period.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger>通訊端選項`false`，建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>，enabled 的屬性設定為`true`，並設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>所需的逾時期限的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption> along with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger> socket option to call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>連同<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger>通訊端選項來呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to close a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何關閉<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a connection to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 建立與遠端主機的連線。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> that represents the remote device.
trans-unit.target: 代表遠端裝置的 <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" />。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a connection to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 建立與遠端主機的連線。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method synchronously establishes a network connection between <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A> and the specified remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，例如 TCP、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法同步網路之間建立連接，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>和指定的遠端端點。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> establishes a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: After you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, you can send data to the remote device with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A> method, or receive data from the remote device with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在您呼叫後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，您可以將資料傳送到遠端裝置與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A>方法，或從遠端裝置與接收資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> before sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，例如 UDP，您不必呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>之前傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> to synchronously communicate with a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>以同步方式與遠端主機通訊。

trans-unit.source: If you do call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，從指定的預設值以外的位址到達任何資料包都會被捨棄。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定預設遠端主機到廣播位址，您必須先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>方法並將通訊端選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method will block, unless you specifically set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A> property to `false` prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法將會封鎖，除非您特別設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A>屬性`false`之前呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol like TCP and you do disable blocking, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> because it needs time to make the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要使用連線導向的通訊協定，例如 TCP 和您不要停用封鎖<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>因為它需要時間來進行連接。

trans-unit.source: Connectionless protocols will not throw an exception because they simply establish a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 因為它們只是建立預設遠端主機，不需連線的通訊協定不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: If the error returned WSAEWOULDBLOCK, the remote host connection has been initiated by a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, but has not yet completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果 WSAEWOULDBLOCK 傳回的錯誤，遠端主機連接已起始連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，但並未尚未順利完成。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A> method to determine when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is finished connecting.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A>方法，以判斷何時<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>完成連接。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and did not call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, the underlying service provider will assign the local network address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定並沒有呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>之前先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，基礎的服務提供者會指派本機網路位址和通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you complete a send or receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，服務提供者會指派本機網路位址和連接埠號碼直到您完成傳送或接收作業。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the default remote host, call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> again with the desired endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更預設遠端主機時，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>再次使用所需的端點。

trans-unit.source: If the socket has been previously disconnected, then you cannot use this method to restore the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果通訊端具有先前中斷連線，然後您就無法使用這個方法還原連接。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> methods to reconnect.
trans-unit.target: 使用其中一種非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法，以重新連線。

trans-unit.source: This is a limitation of the underlying provider.
trans-unit.target: 這是基礎提供者的限制。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會連接到遠端端點，然後驗證該連接。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="remoteEP" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteEP" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have permission for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫堆疊中位置較高的呼叫端對於要求的作業沒有權限。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been placed in a listening state by calling <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" /> 已令 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 處於接聽狀態。

trans-unit.source: for connecting to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 用於連接至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Connect" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Connect" />

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The port number of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a connection to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 建立與遠端主機的連線。

trans-unit.source: The host is specified by an IP address and a port number.
trans-unit.target: 此主機是由 IP 位址和連接埠號碼所指定。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method synchronously establishes a network connection between <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A> and the specified remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，例如 TCP、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法同步網路之間建立連接，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>和指定的遠端端點。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> establishes a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: After you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> you can send data to the remote device with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A> method, or receive data from the remote device with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在您呼叫後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>您可以將資料傳送到遠端裝置與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A>方法，或從遠端裝置與接收資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> before sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，例如 UDP，您不必呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>之前傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> to synchronously communicate with a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>以同步方式與遠端主機通訊。

trans-unit.source: If you do call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>從指定的預設值以外的位址到達任何資料包都會被捨棄。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定預設遠端主機到廣播位址，您必須先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>方法並將通訊端選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method will block, unless you specifically set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A> property to `false` prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> 方法會封鎖，除非您特別設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A>屬性`false`之前呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol like TCP and you do disable blocking, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> because it needs time to make the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要使用連線導向的通訊協定，例如 TCP 和您不要停用封鎖<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>因為它需要時間來進行連接。

trans-unit.source: Connectionless protocols will not throw an exception because they simply establish a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 因為它們只是建立預設遠端主機，不需連線的通訊協定不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: If the error returned WSAEWOULDBLOCK, the remote host connection has been initiated by a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, but has not yet completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果 WSAEWOULDBLOCK 傳回的錯誤，遠端主機連接已起始連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，但並未尚未順利完成。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A> method to determine when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is finished connecting.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A>方法，以判斷何時<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>完成連接。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and did not call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, the underlying service provider will assign the local network address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定並沒有呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>之前先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，基礎的服務提供者會指派本機網路位址和通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you complete a send or receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，服務提供者會指派本機網路位址和連接埠號碼直到您完成傳送或接收作業。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the default remote host, call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> again with the desired endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更預設遠端主機時，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>再次使用所需的端點。

trans-unit.source: If the socket has been previously disconnected, then you cannot use this method to restore the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果通訊端具有先前中斷連線，然後您就無法使用這個方法還原連接。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> methods to reconnect.
trans-unit.target: 使用其中一種非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法，以重新連線。

trans-unit.source: This is a limitation of the underlying provider.
trans-unit.target: 這是基礎提供者的限制。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會連接到遠端端點，然後驗證該連接。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The port number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠號碼無效。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: This method is valid for sockets in the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> or <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> families.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法對 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> 系列通訊端是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="address" /> is zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 的長度為零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been placed in a listening state by calling <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" /> 已令 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 處於接聽狀態。

trans-unit.source: The IP addresses of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The port number of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a connection to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 建立與遠端主機的連線。

trans-unit.source: The host is specified by an array of IP addresses and a port number.
trans-unit.target: 主機是由 IP 位址陣列和連接埠號碼所指定。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used immediately after a call to <xref:System.Net.Dns.GetHostAddresses%2A>, which can return multiple IP addresses for a single host.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常用來呼叫之後立即<xref:System.Net.Dns.GetHostAddresses%2A>，其可以傳回多個 IP 位址的單一主機。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method synchronously establishes a network connection between <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A> and the specified remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，例如 TCP、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法同步網路之間建立連接，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>和指定的遠端端點。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> establishes a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: After you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> you can send data to the remote device with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A> method, or receive data from the remote device with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> before sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，例如 UDP，您不必呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>之前傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> to synchronously communicate with a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>以同步方式與遠端主機通訊。

trans-unit.source: If you do call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>從指定的預設值以外的位址到達任何資料包都會被捨棄。

trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定預設遠端主機到廣播位址，您必須先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>方法並將通訊端選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。
