trans-unit.source: The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會連接到遠端端點，然後驗證該連接。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="addresses" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="addresses" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The port number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠號碼無效。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: This method is valid for sockets in the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> or <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> families.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法對 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> 系列通訊端是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="address" /> is zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 的長度為零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been placed in a listening state by calling <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" /> 已令 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 處於接聽狀態。

trans-unit.source: The name of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The port number of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 遠端主機的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a connection to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 建立與遠端主機的連線。

trans-unit.source: The host is specified by a host name and a port number.
trans-unit.target: 此主機是由主機名稱和連接埠號碼指定。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method synchronously establishes a network connection between <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A> and the specified remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，例如 TCP、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法同步網路之間建立連接，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>和指定的遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> establishes a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: After you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> you can send data to the remote device with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A> method, or receive data from the remote device with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在您呼叫後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>您可以將資料傳送到遠端裝置與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A>方法，或從遠端裝置與接收資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> before sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，例如 UDP，您不必呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>之前傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> to synchronously communicate with a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>以同步方式與遠端主機通訊。

trans-unit.source: If you do call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>從指定的預設值以外的位址到達任何資料包都會被捨棄。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定預設遠端主機到廣播位址，您必須先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>方法並將通訊端選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Broadcast?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method will block, unless you specifically set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A> property to `false` prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> 方法會封鎖，除非您特別設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking%2A>屬性`false`之前呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol like TCP and you do disable blocking, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> because it needs time to make the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要使用連線導向的通訊協定，例如 TCP 和您不要停用封鎖<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>因為它需要時間來進行連接。

trans-unit.source: Connectionless protocols will not throw an exception because they simply establish a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 因為它們只是建立預設遠端主機，不需連線的通訊協定不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: If the error returned WSAEWOULDBLOCK, the remote host connection has been initiated by a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, but has not yet completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果 WSAEWOULDBLOCK 傳回的錯誤，遠端主機連接已起始連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，但並未尚未順利完成。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A> method to determine when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is finished connecting.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A>方法，以判斷何時<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>完成連接。

trans-unit.source: If IPv6 is enabled and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method is called to connect to a host that resolves to both IPv6 and IPv4 addresses, the connection to the IPv6 address will be attempted first before the IPv4 address.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用 IPv6 和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>呼叫方法來連線到主機解析為這兩個 IPv6 和 IPv4 位址，來嘗試連接到 IPv6 位址將會先的 IPv4 位址。

trans-unit.source: This may have the effect of delaying the time to establish the connection if the host is not listening on the IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會有延遲的時間來建立連接，如果主機並未接聽 IPv6 位址的效果。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and did not call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, the underlying service provider will assign the local network address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定並沒有呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>之前先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>，基礎的服務提供者會指派本機網路位址和通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you complete a send or receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，服務提供者會指派本機網路位址和連接埠號碼直到您完成傳送或接收作業。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the default remote host, call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> again with the desired endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更預設遠端主機時，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>再次使用所需的端點。

trans-unit.source: If the socket has been previously disconnected, then you cannot use this method to restore the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果通訊端具有先前中斷連線，然後您就無法使用這個方法還原連接。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A> methods to reconnect.
trans-unit.target: 使用其中一種非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect%2A>方法，以重新連線。

trans-unit.source: This is a limitation of the underlying provider.
trans-unit.target: 這是基礎提供者的限制。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會連接到遠端端點，然後驗證該連接。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="host" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="host" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The port number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠號碼無效。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: This method is valid for sockets in the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> or <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> families.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法對 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> 系列通訊端是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been placed in a listening state by calling <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" /> 已令 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 處於接聽狀態。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request for a connection to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 開始與遠端主機連接的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> object to use for this asynchronous socket operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> 物件，用於這個非同步通訊端作業。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request for a connection to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 開始與遠端主機連接的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the I/O operation is pending.
trans-unit.target: 如果 I/O 作業暫止，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> event on the <paramref name="e" /> parameter will be raised upon completion of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時會引發與 <paramref name="e" /> 參數有關的 <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="false" /> if the I/O operation completed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果 I/O 作業同步完成，則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, The <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> event on the <paramref name="e" /> parameter will not be raised and the <paramref name="e" /> object passed as a parameter may be examined immediately after the method call returns to retrieve the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 在這個情況下，就不會引發與 <paramref name="e" /> 參數有關的 <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> 事件，而在方法呼叫傳回後會立即檢查做為參數傳遞的 <paramref name="e" /> 物件，以擷取作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method starts an asynchronous request for a connection to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法會啟動遠端主機連接的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> establishes a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>建立預設遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\<SocketAsyncEventArgs> delegate and attach the callback to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成的通知，您必須建立實作事件處理常式的回呼方法\<SocketAsyncEventArgs > 委派，並附加至回呼<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: The caller must set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> of the remote host to connect to.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>連線至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The caller may set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.UserToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to any user state object desired before calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端可能設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.UserToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前先呼叫需要任何使用者的狀態物件的屬性<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法，如此將可在回呼方法中擷取資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼必須比單一物件的詳細資訊，您就可以建立小型類別保存做為成員的其他必要的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> before sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，例如 UDP，您不必呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>之前傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendToAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFromAsync%2A> to communicate with a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendToAsync%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFromAsync%2A>與遠端主機通訊。

trans-unit.source: If you do call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>, any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>，從指定的預設值以外的位址到達任何資料包都會被捨棄。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the default remote host, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method again with the desired endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更預設遠端主機時，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法一次所需的端點。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to set the default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> and set Broadcast to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定預設遠端主機的廣播位址，您必須先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>且設定為廣播`true`。

trans-unit.source: If this is not done, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不這麼做，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: The following properties and events on the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType> object are required:
trans-unit.target: 下列的屬性和事件<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件所需：

trans-unit.source: Optionally, a buffer may be provided which will atomically be sent on the socket after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method succeeds.
trans-unit.target: （選擇性） 緩衝區可能會提供其會以不可分割方式之後通訊端上傳送<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法成功。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Buffer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property needs to be set to the buffer containing the data to send and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property needs to be set to the number of bytes of data to send from the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Buffer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性必須設為包含資料的緩衝區，才能傳送和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性必須設定以傳送緩衝區中的資料位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Once a connection is established, this buffer of data is sent.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立連接之後，會傳送此緩衝區的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and do not call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定並沒有呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>之前先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的本機網路位址和通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network IP address and port number until you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，服務提供者會指派本機網路 IP 位址和連接埠號碼直到您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendAsync%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method throws <xref:System.NotSupportedException> if the address family of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> are not the same address family.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>如果的位址系列<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>不相同的位址系列。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> when calling this method, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>呼叫此方法時，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: An argument is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 引數無效。

trans-unit.source: This exception occurs if multiple buffers are specified, the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.BufferList" /> property is not null.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定多個緩衝區而 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.BufferList" /> 屬性不是 null，就會發生這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter cannot be null and the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint" /> cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數不可為 null，而且 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint" /> 也不可為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is listening or a socket operation was already in progress using the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> object specified in the <paramref name="e" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 正在接聽，或是通訊端作業正在進行並且使用 <paramref name="e" /> 參數所指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Windows XP or later is required for this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法需要 Windows XP (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.source: This exception also occurs if the local endpoint and the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint" /> are not the same address family.
trans-unit.target: 如果本機端點和 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint" /> 不是同一個通訊協定家族 (Family)，也會發生這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have permission for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫堆疊中位置較高的呼叫端對於要求的作業沒有權限。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> object to use for this asynchronous socket operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> 物件，用於這個非同步通訊端作業。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request for a connection to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 開始與遠端主機連接的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the I/O operation is pending.
trans-unit.target: 如果 I/O 作業暫止，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> event on the <paramref name="e" /> parameter will be raised upon completion of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時會引發與 <paramref name="e" /> 參數有關的 <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="false" /> if the I/O operation completed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果 I/O 作業同步完成，則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, The <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> event on the <paramref name="e" /> parameter will not be raised and the <paramref name="e" /> object passed as a parameter may be examined immediately after the method call returns to retrieve the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 在這個情況下，就不會引發與 <paramref name="e" /> 參數有關的 <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> 事件，而在方法呼叫傳回後會立即檢查做為參數傳遞的 <paramref name="e" /> 物件，以擷取作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync(System.Net.Sockets.SocketType,System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType,System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs) method starts an asynchronous request for a connection to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync(System.Net.Sockets.SocketType,System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType,System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs) 方法開始的非同步要求連接至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> establishes a default remote host specified by the `socketType` and `protocolType` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>建立預設遠端主機所指定`socketType`和`protocolType`參數。

trans-unit.source: To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\<SocketAsyncEventArgs> delegate and attach the callback to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成的通知，您必須建立實作事件處理常式的回呼方法\<SocketAsyncEventArgs > 委派，並附加至回呼<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: The caller must set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> of the remote host to connect to.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端必須將<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>連線至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: The caller may set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.UserToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to any user state object desired before calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端可能設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.UserToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前先呼叫需要任何使用者的狀態物件的屬性<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法，如此將可在回呼方法中擷取資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members.
trans-unit.target: 如果回呼必須比單一物件的詳細資訊，您就可以建立小型類別保存做為成員的其他必要的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> before sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，例如 UDP，您不必呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>之前傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendToAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFromAsync%2A> to communicate with a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendToAsync%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFromAsync%2A>與遠端主機通訊。

trans-unit.source: If you do call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>, any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>，從指定的預設值以外的位址到達任何資料包都會被捨棄。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the default remote host, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method again with the desired endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更預設遠端主機時，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法一次所需的端點。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to set the default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> and set Broadcast to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定預設遠端主機的廣播位址，您必須先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>且設定為廣播`true`。

trans-unit.source: If this is not done, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不這麼做，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: The following properties and events on the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType> object are required:
trans-unit.target: 下列的屬性和事件<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件所需：

trans-unit.source: Optionally, a buffer may be provided which will atomically be sent on the socket after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method succeeds.
trans-unit.target: （選擇性） 緩衝區可能會提供其會以不可分割方式之後通訊端上傳送<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法成功。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Buffer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property needs to be set to the buffer containing the data to send and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property needs to be set to the number of bytes of data to send from the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Buffer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性必須設為包含資料的緩衝區，才能傳送和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性必須設定以傳送緩衝區中的資料位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Once a connection is established, this buffer of data is sent.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立連接之後，會傳送此緩衝區的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and do not call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定並沒有呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>之前先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的本機網路位址和通訊埠編號。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network IP address and port number until you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，服務提供者會指派本機網路 IP 位址和連接埠號碼直到您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendAsync%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A> method throws <xref:System.NotSupportedException> if the address family of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> are not the same address family.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ConnectAsync%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>如果的位址系列<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>不相同的位址系列。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> when calling this method, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>呼叫此方法時，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: An argument is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 引數無效。

trans-unit.source: This exception occurs if multiple buffers are specified, the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.BufferList" /> property is not null.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定多個緩衝區而 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.BufferList" /> 屬性不是 null，就會發生這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter cannot be null and the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint" /> cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數不可為 null，而且 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint" /> 也不可為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is listening or a socket operation was already in progress using the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> object specified in the <paramref name="e" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 正在接聽，或是通訊端作業正在進行並且使用 <paramref name="e" /> 參數所指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Windows XP or later is required for this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法需要 Windows XP (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.source: This exception also occurs if the local endpoint and the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint" /> are not the same address family.
trans-unit.target: 如果本機端點和 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint" /> 不是同一個通訊協定家族 (Family)，也會發生這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller higher in the call stack does not have permission for the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫堆疊中位置較高的呼叫端對於要求的作業沒有權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is connected to a remote host as of the last <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出上一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 或 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send" /> 作業是否將 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive" /> 連接至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> was connected to a remote resource as of the most recent operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果最近一次的作業是將 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 連接到遠端資源，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則，即為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `Connected` property gets the connection state of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> as of the last I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: `Connected`屬性取得的連接狀態<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>最後一次的 I/O 作業。

trans-unit.source: When it returns `false`, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> was either never connected, or is no longer connected.
trans-unit.target: 當它傳回`false`、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>可能永遠不會連線，或已中斷連線。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A> property reflects the state of the connection as of the most recent operation.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A>屬性會反映最新的作業連接的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If you need to determine the current state of the connection, make a nonblocking, zero-byte Send call.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要判斷目前的連接狀態，請呼叫未封鎖、 零位元組傳送。

trans-unit.source: If the call returns successfully or throws a WAEWOULDBLOCK error code (10035), then the socket is still connected; otherwise, the socket is no longer connected.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫成功傳回，或是擲回 WAEWOULDBLOCK 錯誤程式碼 (10035)，是仍然會連接通訊端。否則，通訊端已中斷連線。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> on a User Datagram Protocol (UDP) socket, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A> property always returns `true`; however, this action does not change the inherent connectionless nature of UDP.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>使用者資料包通訊協定 (UDP) 通訊端上<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A>屬性一律會傳回`true`; 不過，此動作不會變更 UDP 固有無連線性質。

trans-unit.source: The following code example connects to a remote endpoint, checks the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A> property, and checks the current state of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會連接到遠端端點，檢查<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A>屬性，並檢查連接的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this socket can be reused after the current connection is closed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個通訊端可以在關閉目前連線後重複使用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Closes the socket connection and allows reuse of the socket.
trans-unit.target: 關閉通訊端連線並允許重複使用通訊端。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you can use this method to close the socket.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您可以使用這個方法，以關閉通訊端。

trans-unit.source: This method ends the connection and sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會結束連接與集<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: However, if `reuseSocket` is `true`, you can reuse the socket.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果`reuseSocket`是`true`，您可以重複使用的通訊端。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that all data is sent and received before the socket is closed, you should call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> before calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Disconnect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保所有資料都傳送及接收通訊端關閉之前，您應該呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>之前先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Disconnect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you need to call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Disconnect%2A> without first calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>, you can set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger><xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> option to `false` and specify a nonzero time-out interval to ensure that data queued for outgoing transmission is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Disconnect%2A>情況下先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>，您可以設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger><xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>選項設定為`false`並指定非零的逾時間隔，以確保資料佇列的傳出傳輸傳送。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Disconnect%2A> then blocks until the data is sent or until the specified time-out expires.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Disconnect%2A> 然後會封鎖直到傳送資料，或直到指定的逾時過期為止。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger> to `false` and specify a zero time-out interval, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> releases the connection and automatically discards outgoing queued data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DontLinger>至`false`並指定為零的逾時間隔，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>釋放連接，並會自動捨棄傳出佇列的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a socket for synchronous communication and sends some data to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立同步通訊的通訊端，並將部分資料傳送至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: It then calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>, to stop the send and receive activity, and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Disconnect%2A>, to close the socket connection.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>，以停止傳送並接收活動，以及<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Disconnect%2A>以關閉通訊端連線。

trans-unit.source: This method requires Windows 2000 or earlier, or the exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法需要 Windows 2000 (含) 以前版本，否則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />物件已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> object to use for this asynchronous socket operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> 物件，用於這個非同步通訊端作業。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous request to disconnect from a remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步要求，以中斷遠端端點的連接。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the I/O operation is pending.
trans-unit.target: 如果 I/O 作業暫止，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> event on the <paramref name="e" /> parameter will be raised upon completion of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時會引發與 <paramref name="e" /> 參數有關的 <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="false" /> if the I/O operation completed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果 I/O 作業同步完成，則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, The <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> event on the <paramref name="e" /> parameter will not be raised and the <paramref name="e" /> object passed as a parameter may be examined immediately after the method call returns to retrieve the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 在這個情況下，就不會引發與 <paramref name="e" /> 參數有關的 <see cref="E:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.Completed" /> 事件，而在方法呼叫傳回後會立即檢查做為參數傳遞的 <paramref name="e" /> 物件，以擷取作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: When using a connection-oriented protocol, calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DisconnectAsync%2A> method requests a disconnect from a remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使用連線導向的通訊協定，當呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DisconnectAsync%2A>方法會要求中斷連線從遠端端點。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.DisconnectReuseSocket%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to `true` in the `e` parameter, the socket can be reused.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs.DisconnectReuseSocket%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>至`true`中`e`參數時，通訊端可以重複使用。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數不可以是 null。

trans-unit.source: A socket operation was already in progress using the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> object specified in the <paramref name="e" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 通訊端作業已使用 <paramref name="e" /> 參數內指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs" /> 物件正在進行中。

trans-unit.source: Windows XP or later is required for this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法需要 Windows XP (含) 以後版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 方法會將 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to releases only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源；<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />, and optionally disposes of the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性處置 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 <see langword="Dispose" /> 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> allows Internet Protocol (IP) datagrams to be fragmented.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 是否允許將網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 資料包分散。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> allows datagram fragmentation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 允許資料包分散，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Datagrams require fragmentation when their size exceeds the Maximum Transfer Unit (MTU) of the transmission medium.
trans-unit.target: 資料包需要片段，其大小超過最大傳輸單位 (MTU) 的傳輸媒介時。

trans-unit.source: Datagrams may be fragmented by the sending host (all Internet Protocol versions) or an intermediate router (Internet Protocol Version 4 only).
trans-unit.target: 傳送主控件 （所有的網際網路通訊協定版本） 或中繼路由器 (Internet Protocol Version 4 只) 可能分段資料包。

trans-unit.source: If a datagram must be fragmented, and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A> option is set, the datagram is discarded, and an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) error message is sent back to the sender of the datagram.
trans-unit.target: 如果必須分散資料包 (datagram)，而<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A>選項設定，資料包作業會捨棄，並且傳回給寄件者的資料包傳送網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (ICMP) 錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 通訊端上設定這個屬性會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only for sockets in the <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> or <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> families.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只可為 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6" /> 家族中的通訊端設定。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is a dual-mode socket used for both IPv4 and IPv6.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 是否為適用於 IPv4 和 IPv6 的雙重模式通訊端。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is a dual-mode socket; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 是雙重模式通訊端，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target process where a duplicate of the socket reference is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立重複通訊端參考的目標處理序 ID。

trans-unit.source: Duplicates the socket reference for the target process, and closes the socket for this process.
trans-unit.target: 複製目標處理序的通訊端參考，並關閉這個處理序的通訊端。

trans-unit.source: The socket reference to be passed to the target process.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至目標處理序的通訊端參考。

trans-unit.source: The target process should use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.%23ctor%2A> to create the duplicate socket instance.
trans-unit.target: 目標處理序應使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.%23ctor%2A>建立重複的通訊端執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.%23ctor%2A> constructor multiple times with the same byte array as the argument for each call, you will create multiple managed <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> instances with the same underlying socket.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.%23ctor%2A>多次包含相同的位元組陣列，為每個呼叫的引數的建構函式，您將建立受管理的多個<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>具有相同的基礎通訊端的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This practice is strongly discouraged.
trans-unit.target: 這種做法不鼓勵。

trans-unit.source: If the process creating the socket uses asynchronous methods (<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>), the process must first set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.UseOnlyOverlappedIO%2A> property to true; otherwise, the socket is bound to the completion port of the creating process, which may cause an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> to be thrown on the target process.
trans-unit.target: 如果處理程序建立通訊端會使用非同步方法 (<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>)，必須先設定處理程序<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.UseOnlyOverlappedIO%2A>屬性設為 true，否則繫結至所建立的處理序，可能會造成完成通訊埠的通訊端<xref:System.ArgumentNullException>上目標處理序擲回。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetProcessID" /> is not a valid process id.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetProcessID" /> 不是有效的處理序 ID。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Duplication of the socket reference failed.
trans-unit.target: 複製通訊端參考失敗。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> can send or receive broadcast packets.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 是否可以傳送或接收廣播封包。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> allows broadcast packets; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 允許廣播封包，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Broadcasting is limited to a specific subnet, and must use User Datagram Protocol (UDP.) For Internet Protocol version 4, you can broadcast to your local subnet by sending a packet to 255.255.255.255; or you can use the directed broadcast address, which is the network portion of an Internet Protocol (IP) address with all bits set in the host portion.
trans-unit.target: 廣播限制為特定的子網路，而且必須使用使用者資料包通訊協定 (UDP)。針對網際網路通訊協定第 4 版，您可以廣播給您本機子網路封包傳送為 255.255.255.255。或者，您可以使用導向的廣播的位址，也就是使用中的主機部分設定的所有位元的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址的網路部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your IP address is 192.168.1.40 (a Class C address, with a netmask of 255.255.255.0 -- the network portion is the first three octets, and the host portion is the last octet), your directed broadcast address is 192.168.1.255.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的 IP 位址為 192.168.1.40 （類別 C 位址，與網路遮罩為 255.255.255.0 的網路部分是的前三個八位元及主機部分是最後一個八位元） 導向的廣播的位址為 192.168.1.255。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 通訊端上設定這個屬性會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EnableBroadcast%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EnableBroadcast%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This option is valid for a datagram socket only.
trans-unit.target: 這個選項只對資料包通訊端有效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously accepts an incoming connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 非同步接受連入連線嘗試。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the bytes transferred.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，包含已傳輸的位元組。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that stores state information for this asynchronous operation as well as any user defined data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，儲存這個非同步作業的狀態資訊以及任何使用者定義的資料。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously accepts an incoming connection attempt and creates a new <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object to handle remote host communication.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式接受連入連線嘗試，並建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 物件，以處理遠端主機通訊。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a buffer that contains the initial data transferred.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回包含已傳輸之初始資料的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object to handle communication with the remote host.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 物件，可處理與遠端主機的通訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A> completes a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A> 完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>, you need to create a callback method that is invoked by the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>，您必須建立回呼方法所叫用<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派。

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread, and is called by the system after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> method returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個回呼方法會在個別的執行緒中執行，以及之後系統便會呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法會傳回。

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> method of the `asyncResult` parameter to obtain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> on which the connection attempt is being made.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼方法中呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>方法`asyncResult`參數來取得<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>上它正在嘗試連線。

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, you can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A> method to successfully complete the connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 取得之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A>順利完成連接嘗試的方法。

trans-unit.source: The `buffer` parameter of this overload contains the data that was received in the call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> and the `bytesTransferred` parameter contains the number of bytes that were transferred in the call.
trans-unit.target: `buffer`的這個多載的參數包含資料的呼叫中收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>和`bytesTransferred`參數會包含在呼叫中已傳送的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A> method blocks until a connection is pending in the incoming connection queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A>方法會封鎖，直到連接已暫止的連入連線佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A> method accepts the incoming connection and returns a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that can be used to send data to and receive data from the remote host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A>方法接受連入連線，並傳回新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，可以用來傳送和接收來自遠端主機的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.target: 委派會呼叫回呼<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A>來結束非同步的要求。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously accepts an incoming connection attempt and creates a new <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> to handle remote host communication.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式接受連入的連接嘗試，並建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 來處理遠端主機通訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> to handle communication with the remote host.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />，將處理與遠端主機的通訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A> completes a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A> 完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>, you need to create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>，您需要建立回呼方法，實作<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派。

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread, and is called by the system after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> method returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個回呼方法會在個別的執行緒中執行，以及之後系統便會呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法會傳回。

trans-unit.source: It must accept the `asyncResult` parameter returned from the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它必須接受`asyncResult`參數所傳回的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> method of the `asyncResult` parameter to obtain the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> on which the connection attempt is being made.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼方法中呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>方法`asyncResult`參數來取得<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>上它正在嘗試連線。

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, you can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A> method to successfully complete the connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 取得之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A>順利完成連接嘗試的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A> method blocks until a connection is pending in the incoming connection queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A>方法會封鎖，直到連接已暫止的連入連線佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A> method accepts the incoming connection and returns a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that can be used to send data to and receive data from the remote host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndAccept%2A>方法接受連入連線，並傳回新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，可以用來傳送和接收來自遠端主機的資料。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: The `buffer` parameter of this overload contains the data that was received in the call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> and the `bytesTransferred` parameter contains the number of bytes that were transferred in the call.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that stores state information and any user-defined data for this asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，儲存這個非同步作業的狀態資訊以及任何使用者定義的資料。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous disconnect request.
trans-unit.target: 結束暫止非同步中斷連接要求。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndDisconnect%2A> completes a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndDisconnect%2A> 完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndDisconnect%2A> method blocks until the disconnect completes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndDisconnect%2A>方法會封鎖，直到完成中斷連線為止。

trans-unit.source: For information about asynchronous operations, see the Asynchronous Programming Overview topic in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需非同步作業的資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的非同步程式設計的概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a socket for asynchronous communication and sends some data to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立通訊端的非同步通訊，並將部分資料傳送至遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: When the data has been sent, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> is called to stop the send and receive activity.
trans-unit.target: 當已傳送資料時，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>呼叫來停止傳送和接收活動。

trans-unit.source: Then <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect%2A> is called to begin a disconnect request.
trans-unit.target: 然後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect%2A>呼叫來開始中斷連線要求。

trans-unit.source: The callback delegate calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndDisconnect%2A> to end the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: 委派會呼叫回呼<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndDisconnect%2A>來結束非同步的要求。

trans-unit.source: When the request completes, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A> property is queried to test whether the socket is disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 當要求完成時，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connected%2A>屬性會查詢以測試是否已中斷連線通訊端。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is Windows 2000 or earlier, and this method requires Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統是 Windows 2000 (含) 以前版本，但這個方法需要的是 Windows XP。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />物件已關閉。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect(System.Boolean,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不會經由對 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginDisconnect(System.Boolean,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndDisconnect(System.IAsyncResult)" /> was previously called for the asynchronous connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndDisconnect(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 是先前用來呼叫非同步連接。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The disconnect request has timed out.
trans-unit.target: 中斷連接要求已逾時。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 結束擱置的非同步讀取。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 結束擱置的非同步讀取。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: 收到的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A> method completes the asynchronous read operation started in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A>方法完成非同步的讀取的作業，以啟動<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>, you need to create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>，您需要建立回呼方法，實作<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派。

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: 不同的執行緒中執行這個回呼方法，以及之後系統便會呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 回呼方法必須接受<xref:System.IAsyncResult>傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>做為參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> method of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to obtain the state object passed to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼方法中呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>方法<xref:System.IAsyncResult>取得狀態物件傳遞至<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Extract the receiving <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> from this state object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取接收<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>從這個狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, you can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A> method to successfully complete the read operation and return the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 取得之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A>方法已成功完成讀取的作業，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A> method will block until data is available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A>方法將會封鎖直到資料為止。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A> will read the first enqueued datagram available in the incoming network buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A>會讀取內送的網路緩衝區中有可用的第一個加入佇列資料包。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A> method will read as much data as is available up to the number of bytes you specified in the `size` parameter of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A>方法會讀取使用最多為您所指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> method, and all available data has been received, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A> method will complete immediately and return zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>與連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>方法，以及所有可用的資料已經收到，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceive%2A>方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the received data, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> method of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult>, and extract the buffer contained in the resulting state object.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得已接收的資料，請呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>方法<xref:System.IAsyncResult>，然後將解壓縮所產生的狀態物件中包含的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: To cancel a pending <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消暫止<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits.
trans-unit.target: 該執行緒結束時，會取消給定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。

trans-unit.source: A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example ends a pending asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會暫止的非同步讀取。

trans-unit.source: For a complete example that demonstrates asynchronous communications with sockets, see [Socket Code Examples](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何透過通訊端的非同步通訊的完整範例，請參閱[通訊端程式碼範例](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md)。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不會經由對 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous read from a specific endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的端點結束暫止的非同步讀取。

trans-unit.source: If successful, the number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，則傳回接收的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: If unsuccessful, returns 0.
