trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A> method completes the asynchronous read operation started in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>方法完成非同步的讀取的作業，以啟動<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>, you need to create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>，您需要建立回呼方法，實作<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派。

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: 不同的執行緒中執行這個回呼方法，以及之後系統便會呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 回呼方法必須接受<xref:System.IAsyncResult>傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>做為參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> method of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to obtain the state object passed to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼方法中呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>方法<xref:System.IAsyncResult>取得狀態物件傳遞至<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Extract the receiving <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> from this state object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取接收<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>從這個狀態物件。

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, you can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A> method to successfully complete the read operation and return the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 取得之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>方法已成功完成讀取的作業，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A> method will block until data is available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>方法將會封鎖直到資料為止。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A> will read the first enqueued datagram available in the incoming network buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>會讀取內送的網路緩衝區中有可用的第一個加入佇列資料包。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A> method will read as much data as is available up to the number of bytes you specified in the `size` parameter of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>方法會讀取使用最多為您所指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> method, and all available data has been received, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A> method will complete immediately and return zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>與連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>方法，以及所有可用的資料已經收到，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom%2A>方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the received data, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> method of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object, and extract the buffer contained in the resulting state object.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得已接收的資料，請呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>方法<xref:System.IAsyncResult>物件，並擷取產生的狀態物件中包含的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: To identify the originating host, extract the <xref:System.Net.EndPoint> and cast it to an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 若要識別原始主機，請解壓縮<xref:System.Net.EndPoint>並將其轉換<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Address%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to obtain the IP address and the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Port%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to obtain the port number.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Address%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以取得 IP 位址和<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Port%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以取得連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example ends a pending asynchronous read from a specific <xref:System.Net.EndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會暫止的非同步讀取從特定<xref:System.Net.EndPoint>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不會經由對 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.EndPoint@)" /> was previously called for the asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 先前已針對非同步讀取呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.EndPoint@)" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that stores state information and any user defined data for this asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，存放此非同步作業 (Asynchronous Operation) 的狀態資訊和任何使用者定義的資料。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> values for the received packet.
trans-unit.target: 接收封包之 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The source <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> and interface of the received packet.
trans-unit.target: 接收之封包的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> 和介面。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous read from a specific endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的端點結束暫止的非同步讀取。

trans-unit.source: This method also reveals more information about the packet than <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.EndPoint@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法還會比 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.EndPoint@)" /> 提供更多的封包資訊。

trans-unit.source: If successful, the number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，則傳回接收的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: If unsuccessful, returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果不成功，則傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業尚未完成，這個方法會封鎖，直到它執行。

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式執行這項作業，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Examine `ipPacketInformation` if you need to know if the datagram was sent using a unicast, multicast, or broadcast address.
trans-unit.target: 檢查`ipPacketInformation`如果您需要知道資料包使用單點傳播、 多點傳送或廣播位址來傳送。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 是 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="endPoint" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="endPoint" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不會經由對 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> was previously called for the asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 先前已針對非同步讀取呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 結束暫止的非同步傳送。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 結束暫止的非同步傳送。

trans-unit.source: If successful, the number of bytes sent to the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />; otherwise, an invalid <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> error.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，則將位元組數目傳送至 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />，否則，則產生一個無效的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> completes the asynchronous send operation started in <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> 完成非同步傳送作業啟動<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>, you need to create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>，您需要建立回呼方法，實作<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派。

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: 不同的執行緒中執行這個回呼方法，以及之後系統便會呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 回呼方法必須接受<xref:System.IAsyncResult>傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>做為參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> method of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> parameter to obtain the sending <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼方法中呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>方法<xref:System.IAsyncResult>參數來取得傳送<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, you can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> method to successfully complete the send operation and return the number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: 取得之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>方法已成功完成傳送作業並傳回傳送的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> will block until the datagram is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>會阻擋，直到傳送資料包。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> will block until some of the buffer was sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>會阻擋，直到緩衝區的某些訊息已傳送。

trans-unit.source: If the return value from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> indicates that the buffer was not completely sent, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method again, modifying the buffer to hold the unsent data.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回的值從<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>表示緩衝區無法完全傳送時，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法一次，修改要保存未傳送的資料的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately.
trans-unit.target: 沒有保證您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路。

trans-unit.source: To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected.
trans-unit.target: 若要增加網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的連出的資料。

trans-unit.source: A successful completion of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法表示的基礎系統已加入您網路的資料傳送的緩衝區空間。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits.
trans-unit.target: 該執行緒結束時，會取消給定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。

trans-unit.source: A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.
trans-unit.target: 傳送成功完成並不表示已成功傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有緩衝區空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統中，除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: If successful, the number of bytes sent to the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />; otherwise, an invalid <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> error.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，則將位元組數目傳送至 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />，否則，則產生一個無效的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> will block until some of the buffer was sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>會阻擋，直到緩衝區的某些訊息已傳送。

trans-unit.source: If the return value from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A> indicates that the buffer was not completely sent, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method again, modifying the buffer to hold the unsent data.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回的值從<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend%2A>表示緩衝區無法完全傳送時，呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法一次，修改要保存未傳送的資料的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately.
trans-unit.target: 沒有保證您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路。

trans-unit.source: To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected.
trans-unit.target: 若要增加網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的連出的資料。

trans-unit.source: A successful completion of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A> method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend%2A>方法表示的基礎系統已加入您網路的資料傳送的緩衝區空間。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits.
trans-unit.target: 該執行緒結束時，會取消給定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。

trans-unit.source: A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.
trans-unit.target: 傳送成功完成並不表示已成功傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有緩衝區空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統中，除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不會經由對 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSend(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend(System.IAsyncResult)" /> was previously called for the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 先前已針對非同步傳送呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSend(System.IAsyncResult)" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that stores state information for this asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件，儲存這個非同步作業的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous send of a file.
trans-unit.target: 結束檔案的暫止非同步傳送。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> completes the asynchronous send operation started in <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> 完成非同步傳送作業啟動<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>, you must create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>，您必須建立實作的回呼方法<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派。

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: 不同的執行緒中執行這個回呼方法，以及之後系統便會呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object returned by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 回呼方法必須接受<xref:System.IAsyncResult>所傳回物件<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>做為參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> method of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> parameter to obtain the sending <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼方法中呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>方法<xref:System.IAsyncResult>參數來取得傳送<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, you can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> method to successfully complete the send operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A>順利完成傳送作業的方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> blocks until the datagram is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A>封鎖，直到傳送資料包。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> blocks until the entire file is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A>封鎖，直到整個檔案傳送。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately.
trans-unit.target: 沒有保證您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路。

trans-unit.source: To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected.
trans-unit.target: 若要增加網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的連出的資料。

trans-unit.source: A successful completion of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A> method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile%2A>方法表示的基礎系統已加入您網路的資料傳送的緩衝區空間。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and connects a socket for asynchronous communication and begins sending the file "text.txt" asynchronously to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立連接的非同步通訊的通訊端並開始以非同步方式至遠端主機傳送檔案"text.txt"。

trans-unit.source: The callback delegate calls <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A> to complete the transmission.
trans-unit.target: 委派會呼叫回呼<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile%2A>完成傳輸。

trans-unit.source: Windows NT is required for this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法需要 Windows NT。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />物件已關閉。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 是空的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile(System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不會經由對 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile(System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile(System.IAsyncResult)" /> was previously called for the asynchronous <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile(System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 先前已呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendFile(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 用於非同步 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendFile(System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous send to a specific location.
trans-unit.target: 結束暫止的非同步傳送至指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: If successful, the number of bytes sent; otherwise, an invalid <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> error.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，則傳送位元組數目，否則，則產生一個無效的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A> completes the asynchronous send operation started in <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A> 完成非同步傳送作業啟動<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>, you need to create a callback method that implements the <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>，您需要建立回呼方法，實作<xref:System.AsyncCallback>委派。

trans-unit.source: This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: 不同的執行緒中執行這個回呼方法，以及之後系統便會呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginReceive%2A>傳回。

trans-unit.source: The callback method must accept the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 回呼方法必須接受<xref:System.IAsyncResult>傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>做為參數的方法。

trans-unit.source: Within the callback method, call the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A> method of the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> parameter to obtain the sending <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 在回呼方法中呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A>方法<xref:System.IAsyncResult>參數來取得傳送<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: After obtaining the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, you can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A> method to successfully complete the send operation and return the number of bytes sent.
trans-unit.target: 取得之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A>方法已成功完成傳送作業並傳回傳送的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A> will block until the datagram is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A>會阻擋，直到傳送資料包。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A> will block until the requested number of bytes are sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo%2A>會阻擋，直到傳送要求的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately.
trans-unit.target: 沒有保證您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路。

trans-unit.source: To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected.
trans-unit.target: 若要增加網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的連出的資料。

trans-unit.source: A successful completion of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A> method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo%2A>方法表示的基礎系統已加入您網路的資料傳送的緩衝區空間。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example ends an asynchronous send to a specific location.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會結束非同步傳送至特定位置。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by a call to the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Net.EndPoint,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不會經由對 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginSendTo(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Net.EndPoint,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法的呼叫傳回。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo(System.IAsyncResult)" /> was previously called for the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 先前已針對非同步傳送呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndSendTo(System.IAsyncResult)" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> allows only one process to bind to a port.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 是否只允許一個處理序繫結至通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> allows only one socket to bind to a specific port; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 只允許一個通訊端繫結至特定通訊埠，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" /> for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Service Pack 2, and <see langword="false" /> for all other versions.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<see langword="true" />為 Windows Server 2003 和 Windows XP Service Pack 2 和<see langword="false" />對於所有其他版本。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> is `false`, multiple sockets can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method to bind to a specific port; however only one of the sockets can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>是`false`，可以使用多個通訊端<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>繫結至特定的連接埠的方法，不過只有其中一個通訊端可以執行網路流量傳送至連接埠的作業。

trans-unit.source: If more than one socket attempts to use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%28System.Net.EndPoint%29> method to bind to a particular port, then the one with the more specific IP address will handle the network traffic sent to that port.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個通訊端嘗試使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%28System.Net.EndPoint%29>方法來將繫結至特定的連接埠，然後更特定的 IP 位址，一個會處理傳送至該通訊埠的網路流量。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> is `true`, the first use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method to attempt to bind to a particular port, regardless of Internet Protocol (IP) address, will succeed; all subsequent uses of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method to attempt to bind to that port will fail until the original bound socket is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>是`true`，第一次使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法，以嘗試繫結至特定的連接埠，不論網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址，將會成功，則會使用所有後續的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>會嘗試將該連接埠繫結的方法失敗，直到原始的繫結通訊端被終結。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set before <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> is called; otherwise an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性必須先設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>呼叫; 否則為<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind(System.Net.EndPoint)" /> has been called for this <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 已為這個 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind(System.Net.EndPoint)" /> 呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: Frees resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 類別所使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class finalizer calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method to close the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and free resources associated with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>類別完成項呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法，關閉<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>以及釋放相關聯的資源<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> option.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 選項值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of a specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> option, represented as an object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 選項的值，表示為物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the value of the option.
trans-unit.target: 表示選項值的物件。

trans-unit.source: When the <paramref name="optionName" /> parameter is set to <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Linger" /> the return value is an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 當 <paramref name="optionName" /> 參數設為 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Linger" /> 時，傳回值將會是 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When <paramref name="optionName" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.AddMembership" /> or <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DropMembership" />, the return value is an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 當 <paramref name="optionName" /> 設為 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.AddMembership" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DropMembership" /> 時，傳回值將會是 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When <paramref name="optionName" /> is any other value, the return value is an integer.
trans-unit.target: 當 <paramref name="optionName" /> 是其他的任何值時，傳回的值則是一個整數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> options determine the behavior of the current <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> 選項會決定目前的行為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to get the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Linger>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.AddMembership>, and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DropMembership><xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> options.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得使用此多載<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Linger>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.AddMembership>，和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DropMembership><xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>選項。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Linger> option, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> for the `optionLevel` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Linger>選項，請使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>如`optionLevel`參數。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.AddMembership> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DropMembership>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel.IP>.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.AddMembership>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.DropMembership>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel.IP>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the value of any of the options listed above, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要設定任何上述選項的值，請使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A> time-out values and displays them to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會擷取<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A>逾時的值，並加以顯示到主控台。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="optionName" /> was set to the unsupported value <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.MaxConnections" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="optionName" /> 設定為不支援的值 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.MaxConnections" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that is to receive the option setting.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，將要接收選項設定。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> option setting, represented as a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 選項設定，表示為位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> options determine the behavior of the current <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> 選項會決定目前的行為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Upon successful completion of this method, the array specified by the `optionValue` parameter contains the value of the specified <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> option.
trans-unit.target: 在此方法成功完成時，陣列會指定由`optionValue`參數包含指定的值<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>選項。

trans-unit.source: When the length of the `optionValue` array is smaller than the number of bytes required to store the value of the specified <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> option, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 當長度`optionValue`陣列的儲存值加上指定所需的位元組數目小於<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>選項，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload for any sockets that are represented by Boolean values or integers.
trans-unit.target: 布林值或整數都由任何通訊端使用這個多載。

trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
In .NET Compact Framework applications, the Windows CE default buffer space is set to 32768 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Compact Framework 應用程式中，Windows CE 的預設緩衝區空間設為 32768 個位元組。

trans-unit.source: You can change the per socket buffer space by calling <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption" />，以變更每個通訊端緩衝區空間。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the expected return value.
trans-unit.target: 要限制的傳回值長度，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> option in an array.
trans-unit.target: 以陣列傳回指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 選項的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the value of the socket option.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，包含通訊端選項值。

trans-unit.source: The `optionLength` parameter sets the maximum size of the returned byte array.
trans-unit.target: `optionLength`參數集傳回的位元組陣列的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: If the option value requires fewer bytes, the array will contain only that many bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果選項值需要更少個位元組，陣列將只包含多個位元組。

trans-unit.source: If the option value requires more bytes, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果選項值需要更多的位元組<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload for any sockets that are represented by Boolean values or integers.
trans-unit.target: 布林值或整數都由任何通訊端使用這個多載。

trans-unit.source: Gets the operating system handle for the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的作業系統處理。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that represents the operating system handle for the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的作業系統控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Sets low-level operating modes for the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的低階作業系統模式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the control code of the operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指定要執行之作業的控制碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains the input data required by the operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，包含作業所需的輸入資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains the output data returned by the operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，包含作業傳回的輸出資料。

trans-unit.source: Sets low-level operating modes for the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> using numerical control codes.
trans-unit.target: 使用數值控制碼，設定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的低階作業模式。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the <paramref name="optionOutValue" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="optionOutValue" /> 中的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.IOControl%2A> method provides low-level access to the operating system <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> underlying the current instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.IOControl%2A>方法提供低層級存取作業系統<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>基礎的目前執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the WSAIoctl documentation in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 WSAIoctl 文件。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example compares the results of calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.IOControl%2A> with <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IOControlCode.DataToRead> and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會比較呼叫的結果<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.IOControl%2A>與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IOControlCode.DataToRead>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to change the blocking mode without using the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 已嘗試不使用 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Blocking" /> 屬性來變更封鎖模式。

trans-unit.source: to execute unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 執行 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is bound to a specific local port.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 是否繫結至特定的本機通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is bound to a local port; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 繫結至本機通訊埠，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A socket is considered bound to a local port if it is explicitly bound by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method, or implicitly bound by calling members like <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>, which use an ephemeral local port (a free port greater than 1024, selected by the operating system.) Servers use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method to bind to a well-known port so that clients may connect to them.
trans-unit.target: 通訊端視為已繫結至本機連接埠如果明確繫結呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法，或隱含地繫結，透過呼叫的成員，像是<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SendTo%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>，會使用暫時的本機連接埠 （可用的通訊埠大於1024，選取作業系統。)伺服器會使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>繫結的已知的連接埠，讓用戶端可能會連線到它們的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.IsBound%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.IsBound%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> will delay closing a socket in an attempt to send all pending data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 是否會延遲關閉通訊端，以嘗試傳送所有暫止資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption" /> that specifies how to linger while closing a socket.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption" />，指定關閉通訊端時如何延遲。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property changes the way <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method behaves.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>屬性變更的方式<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法的行為。

trans-unit.source: This property when set modifies the conditions under which the connection can be reset by Winsock.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性集修改的條件的連線可以來重設 Winsock 時。

trans-unit.source: Connection resets can still occur based on the IP protocol behavior.
trans-unit.target: 連接重設仍可能是根據 IP 通訊協定行為。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the length of time that a connection-oriented connection will remain open after a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> when data remains to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會控制的呼叫之後，連線導向的連接將維持開啟的時間長度<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>時仍可傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: When you call methods to send data to a peer, this data is placed in the outgoing network buffer.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫方法，將資料傳送至對等時，這項資料會在傳出的網路緩衝區中。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to ensure that this data is sent to the remote host before the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A> method drops the connection.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來確保這些資料會傳送至遠端主機之前<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A>方法會卸除連接。

trans-unit.source: To enable lingering, create a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption> instance containing the desired values, and set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用延遲，請建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption>執行個體包含所需的值，並設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>屬性與這個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the behavior of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method for the possible values of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.Enabled%2A> property and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A> property stored in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的行為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>的可能值的方法<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.Enabled%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>屬性儲存在<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: LingerState.Enabled
trans-unit.target: LingerState.Enabled

trans-unit.source: LingerState.LingerTime
trans-unit.target: LingerState.LingerTime

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行為

trans-unit.source: `false` (disabled), the default value
trans-unit.target: `false` （已停用），預設值

trans-unit.source: The time-out is not applicable, (default).
trans-unit.target: 不適用，在逾時 （預設值）。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to send pending data until the default IP protocol time-out expires.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將預設 IP 通訊協定等候逾時到期之前傳送暫止的資料。

trans-unit.source: `true` (enabled)
trans-unit.target: `true` （已啟用）

trans-unit.source: A nonzero time-out
trans-unit.target: 非零的逾時

trans-unit.source: Attempts to send pending data until the specified time-out expires, and if the attempt fails, then Winsock resets the connection.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試傳送暫止資料，直到指定的逾時到期，而如果嘗試失敗，則 Winsock 重設連接。

trans-unit.source: `true` (enabled)
trans-unit.target: `true` （已啟用）

trans-unit.source: A zero timeout.
trans-unit.target: 零逾時。

trans-unit.source: Discards any pending data.
trans-unit.target: 會捨棄任何暫止的資料。

trans-unit.source: For connection-oriented socket (TCP, for example), Winsock resets the connection.
trans-unit.target: 連接導向通訊端 (例如 TCP)，Winsock 重設連接。

trans-unit.source: The IP stack computes the default IP protocol time-out period to use based on the round trip time of the connection.
trans-unit.target: IP 堆疊計算預設 IP 通訊協定逾時期間，若要使用的連線的來回時間為基礎。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the time-out computed by the stack is more relevant than one defined by an application.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，堆疊計算的逾時值為更有相關性比其中一個應用程式所定義的。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior for a socket when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設行為是通訊端時<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A> property stored in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property is set greater than the default IP protocol time-out, the default IP protocol time-out will still apply and override.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.Sockets.LingerOption.LingerTime%2A>屬性儲存在<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>屬性設定大於預設 IP 通訊協定等候逾時，仍將套用的預設 IP 通訊協定逾時，覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LingerState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the pending connections queue.
trans-unit.target: 暫止連接佇列的最大長度。

trans-unit.source: Places a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> in a listening state.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 置於接聽狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen%2A> causes a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to listen for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen%2A> 會導致連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>接聽連入連線嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The `backlog` parameter specifies the number of incoming connections that can be queued for acceptance.
trans-unit.target: `backlog`參數會指定可排入佇列接受連入連線的數目。

trans-unit.source: To determine the maximum number of connections you can specify, retrieve the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.MaxConnections> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷您可以指定的連線的數目上限，擷取<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.MaxConnections>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen%2A> does not block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen%2A> 不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A> to accept a connection from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginAccept%2A>以接受來自佇列的連線。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法之前先呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The backlog parameter is limited to different values depending on the Operating System.
trans-unit.target: 待處理項目參數會限制為不同的值視作業系統而定。

trans-unit.source: You may specify a higher value, but the backlog will be limited based on the Operating System.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定較高的值，但是待處理項目會受到限制基礎作業系統。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to listen for incoming connections.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>來接聽連入連線。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得本機端點。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is using for communications.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" />，<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 正將它用於通訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A> property gets an <xref:System.Net.EndPoint> that contains the local IP address and port number to which your <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is bound.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>屬性會取得<xref:System.Net.EndPoint>本機 IP 位址和連接埠編號，其中包含您<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>繫結。

trans-unit.source: You must cast this <xref:System.Net.EndPoint> to an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> before retrieving any information.
trans-unit.target: 您必須將此轉型<xref:System.Net.EndPoint>至<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>之前擷取的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can then call the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Address%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the local <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>, and the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Port%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the local port number.
trans-unit.target: 您可以接著呼叫<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Address%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來擷取本機<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>，而<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Port%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來擷取本機連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A> property is usually set after you make a call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>屬性通常設定進行的呼叫之後<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Bind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you allow the system to assign your socket's local IP address and port number, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A> property will be set after the first I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您允許系統在將通訊端的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼指派<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint%2A>之後第一項 I/O 作業將會設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: For connection-oriented protocols, the first I/O operation would be a call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 連線導向的通訊協定，第一項 I/O 作業將會是呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For connectionless protocols, the first I/O operation would be any of the send or receive calls.
trans-unit.target: 無連接的通訊協定，第一項 I/O 作業會是任何傳送或接收呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves and displays the local and remote endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會擷取，並顯示本機和遠端端點。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether outgoing multicast packets are delivered to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定輸出多點傳送封包是否會傳遞至傳送應用程式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> receives outgoing multicast packets; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 會接收輸出多點傳送封包，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Multicast is a scalable method for many-to-many communication on the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 多點傳送是網際網路上的多對多通訊的擴充方法。

trans-unit.source: A process subscribes to a multicast address; then, any packets sent by a subscribed process are received by every other process subscribed to the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: 處理序會訂閱的多點傳送位址。接著，每個訂閱多點傳送位址的處理序會接收任何已訂閱的處理序所傳送的封包。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 通訊端上設定這個屬性會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.MulticastLoopback%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.MulticastLoopback%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the stream <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is using the Nagle algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指定資料流 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 是否使用 Nagle 演算法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> uses the Nagle algorithm; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 使用 Nagle 演算法，則為 <see langword="false" />，否則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The Nagle algorithm is designed to reduce network traffic by causing the socket to buffer small packets and then combine and send them in one packet under certain circumstances.
trans-unit.target: Nagle 演算法被為了減少網路流量，讓通訊端緩衝小型封包然後結合並在某些情況下一個封包中傳送它們。

trans-unit.source: A TCP packet consists of 40 bytes of header plus the data being sent.
trans-unit.target: TCP 封包包含 40 個位元組的標頭加上傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: When small packets of data are sent with TCP, the overhead resulting from the TCP header can become a significant part of the network traffic.On heavily loaded networks, the congestion resulting from this overhead can result in lost datagrams and retransmissions, as well as excessive propagation time caused by congestion.
trans-unit.target: 小型資料封包傳送時使用的 TCP，TCP 標頭造成的負擔可能會變得的網路流量的重要部分。在繁重的網路壅塞造成這項負擔可能會導致遺失的資料包和重新傳輸，以及因壅塞的過多的傳播時間。

trans-unit.source: The Nagle algorithm inhibits the sending of new TCP segmentswhen new outgoing data arrives from the user if any previouslytransmitted data on the connection remains unacknowledged.
trans-unit.target: Nagle 演算法禁止傳送新的 TCP segmentswhen 新輸出的資料到達時使用者如果在連接上的任何 previouslytransmitted 資料會維持未認可。

trans-unit.source: The majority of network applications should use the Nagle algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的網路應用程式應該使用 Nagle 演算法。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property on a User Datagram Protocol (UDP) socket will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 使用者資料包通訊協定 (UDP) 通訊端上設定這個屬性會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.NoDelay%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.NoDelay%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the underlying operating system and network adaptors support Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4).
trans-unit.target: 指出基礎作業系統和網路配置器是否支援網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operating system and network adaptors support the IPv4 protocol; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統和網路配置器支援 IPv4 通訊協定則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The operating system may support both IPv4 and IPv6 protocols.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統可能會支援 IPv4 和 IPv6 通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the underlying operating system and network adaptors support Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6).
trans-unit.target: 指出基礎作業系統和網路配置器是否支援網際網路通訊協定第 6 版 (IPv6)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operating system and network adaptors support the IPv6 protocol; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統和網路配置器支援 IPv6 通訊協定則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The operating system may support both IPv4 and IPv6 protocols.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統可能會支援 IPv4 和 IPv6 通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: The time to wait for a response, in microseconds.
trans-unit.target: 等待回應的時間，以微秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Determines the status of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 決定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The status of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> based on the polling mode value passed in the <paramref name="mode" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的狀態，根據從 <paramref name="mode" /> 參數中傳遞的輪詢模式值而定。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Mode
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 模式

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Return Value
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 傳回值

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term><see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectRead" /></term><description><see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" /> has been called and a connection is pending;
trans-unit.target: 如果已呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Listen(System.Int32)" /> 且連接暫止時，則為 </description></listheader><item><term><see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectRead" /></term><description><see langword="true" />；

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="true" /> if data is available for reading;
trans-unit.target: 如果資料可供讀取，則為 <see langword="true" />；

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="true" /> if the connection has been closed, reset, or terminated;
trans-unit.target: 如果連接已經關閉、重設或結束，則為 <see langword="true" />；

trans-unit.source: otherwise, returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 否則，傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果處理 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect(System.Net.EndPoint)" /> 且已成功建立連接時，則為 </description></item><item><term><see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectWrite" /></term><description><see langword="true" />；

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="true" /> if data can be sent;
trans-unit.target: 如果可以傳送資料，則為 <see langword="true" />；

trans-unit.source: otherwise, returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 否則，傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectError" /></term><description><see langword="true" /> if processing a <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect(System.Net.EndPoint)" /> that does not block, and the connection has failed;
trans-unit.target: 如果處理的 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect(System.Net.EndPoint)" /> 沒有封鎖且連接已失敗時，則為 </description></item><item><term><see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectError" /></term><description><see langword="true" />；
