<see langword="true" /> if <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.OutOfBandInline" /> is not set and out-of-band data is available;
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定 <see cref="F:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.OutOfBandInline" /> 且 Out-of-Band Data 可用時，則為 <see langword="true" />；

trans-unit.source: otherwise, returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 否則，傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A> method will check the state of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A>方法會檢查的狀態<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectRead?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the `selectMode` parameter to determine if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is readable.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectRead?displayProperty=nameWithType>如`selectMode`參數，來判斷如果<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>是否可讀取。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectWrite?displayProperty=nameWithType> to determine if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is writable.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectWrite?displayProperty=nameWithType>判斷<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>是可寫入。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectError?displayProperty=nameWithType> to detect an error condition.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode.SelectError?displayProperty=nameWithType>偵測錯誤狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A> will block execution until the specified time period, measured in `microseconds`, elapses.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A> 將會封鎖執行，直到指定的時間長度，以測量`microseconds`，捨棄。

trans-unit.source: Set the `microSeconds` parameter to a negative integer if you would like to wait indefinitely for a response.
trans-unit.target: 設定`microSeconds`負整數，如果您想要無限期地等待回應的參數。

trans-unit.source: If you want to check the status of multiple sockets, you might prefer to use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要檢查多個通訊端的狀態，您可能會偏好使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot detect certain kinds of connection problems, such as a broken network cable, or that the remote host was shut down ungracefully.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法偵測某些類型的連線問題，例如中斷的網路纜線，或遠端主機已強制關閉。

trans-unit.source: You must attempt to send or receive data to detect these kinds of errors.
trans-unit.target: 您必須嘗試傳送或接收資料，以偵測這類錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a socket, connects to a server, and uses <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A> to check the status of the socket.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立通訊端、 連接到伺服器，並使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A>檢查通訊端的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="mode" /> parameter is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" /> 參數不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SelectMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See remarks below.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱下面的＜備註＞。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets the protocol type of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的通訊協定 (Protocol) 類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ProtocolType%2A> property is set when the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is created, and specifies the protocol used by that <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ProtocolType%2A>時設定屬性<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>建立，並指定所使用的通訊協定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType>, and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType> to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示<xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>， <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketType>，和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType>至主控台。

trans-unit.source: Receives data from a bound <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 從已繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 接收資料。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that is the storage location for the received data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，為收到資料的存放位置。

trans-unit.source: Receives data from a bound <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> into a receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 從已繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 接收資料至接收緩衝區中。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: 收到的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method reads data into the buffer parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會將資料讀入緩衝區參數並傳回成功讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> from both connection-oriented and connectionless sockets.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>從連線導向和無連線通訊端。

trans-unit.source: This overload only requires you to provide a receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載只會要求您提供接收緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The buffer offset defaults to 0, the size defaults to the length of the buffer parameter, and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags> value defaults to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.None>.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區位移的預設值為 0，大小預設為參數的長度的緩衝區，而<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags>值預設為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.None>。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> to establish a remote host connection, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> to accept an incoming connection prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>建立遠端主機連線，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>接受連入連線，然後才呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will only read data that arrives from the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法只會讀取來自遠端主機中建立資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, you can also use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您也可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> will allow you to receive data arriving from any host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> 可讓您接收資料抵達的任何主機。

trans-unit.source: If no data is available for reading, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will block until data is available, unless a time-out value was set by using <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料可供讀取，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會封鎖，直到資料可用，除非使用已設定的逾時值<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the time-out value was exceeded, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> call will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已超過逾時值，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>呼叫會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the in the protocol stack buffer, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在未封鎖模式中，而且沒有使用中的資料通訊協定堆疊緩衝區<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，則擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> property to determine if data is available for reading.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> is non-zero, retry the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>為非零，接收作業的重試。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will read as much data as is available, up to the size of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會讀取到緩衝區的大小，可用的資料量。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> method, and all available data has been received, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and return zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>與連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>方法，以及所有可用的資料已經收到，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> will read the first queued datagram from the destination address you specify in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>會從您在中指定的目的地位址讀取第一個佇列的資料包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of the `buffer` parameter, `buffer` gets filled with the first part of the message, the excess data is lost and a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您接收的資料包大於大小`buffer`參數，`buffer`填入訊息的第一個部分，與過多的資料會遺失與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example receives data on a connected <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會收到上連接的資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller in the call stack does not have the required permissions.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫堆疊中的呼叫端沒有所需的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: for accepting connections from the network.
trans-unit.target: 接受來自網路的連線。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Accept" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Accept" />。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.ArraySegment`1" />s of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the received data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ArraySegment`1" /> 型別的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 清單，包含已接收的資料。

trans-unit.source: Receives data from a bound <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> into the list of receive buffers.
trans-unit.target: 從已繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 接收資料至接收緩衝區清單中。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: 收到的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: This method reads data into the buffers parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將資料讀入緩衝區參數，並傳回成功讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: You can call from both connection-oriented and connectionless sockets.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從連線導向和無連線通訊端呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This overload requires you to provide one or more receive buffers.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載都需要您提供一個或多個接收緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> to establish a remote host connection, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> to accept an incoming connection prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>建立遠端主機連線，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>接受連入連線，然後才呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will only read data that arrives from the remote host connection established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法只會讀取來自中建立的遠端主機連接的資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, you can also use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您也可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> will allow you to receive data arriving from any host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> 可讓您接收資料抵達的任何主機。

trans-unit.source: If no data is available for reading, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will block until data is available, unless a time-out value was set by using <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料可供讀取，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會封鎖，直到資料可用，除非使用已設定的逾時值<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the time-out value was exceeded, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> call will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已超過逾時值，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>呼叫會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the in the protocol stack buffer, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在未封鎖模式中，而且沒有使用中的資料通訊協定堆疊緩衝區<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，則擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> property to determine if data is available for reading.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> is non-zero, retry the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>為非零，接收作業的重試。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will read as much data as is available, up to the size of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會讀取到緩衝區的大小，可用的資料量。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> method, and all available data has been received, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and return zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>與連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>方法，以及所有可用的資料已經收到，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> will read the first enqueued datagram from the destination address you specify in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>會從您在中指定的目的地位址讀取第一個加入佇列資料包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of the `buffers` parameter, `buffers` gets filled with the first part of the message, the excess data is lost and a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您接收的資料包大於大小`buffers`參數，`buffers`填入訊息的第一個部分，與過多的資料會遺失與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: **Note** This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that is the storage location for the received data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，為收到資料的存放位置。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: Receives data from a bound <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> into a receive buffer, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />，從已繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 接收資料至接收緩衝區中。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: 收到的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method reads data into the buffer parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會將資料讀入緩衝區參數並傳回成功讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> from both connection-oriented and connectionless sockets.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>從連線導向和無連線通訊端。

trans-unit.source: This overload only requires you to provide a receive buffer and the necessary <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags>.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載只會要求您提供接收緩衝區和必要<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags>。

trans-unit.source: The buffer offset defaults to 0, and the size defaults to the length of the byte parameter.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區位移的預設值為 0，且大小預設值為位元組參數的長度。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> to establish a remote host connection, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> to accept an incoming connection prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>建立遠端主機連線，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>接受連入連線，然後才呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will only read data that arrives from the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法只會讀取來自遠端主機中建立資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, you can also use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您也可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> will allow you to receive data arriving from any host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> 可讓您接收資料抵達的任何主機。

trans-unit.source: If no data is available for reading, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will block until data is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料可供讀取，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法將會封鎖直到資料為止。

trans-unit.source: If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the protocol stack buffer, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在未封鎖模式中，而且沒有可用的通訊協定堆疊緩衝區中的資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，則擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> property to determine if data is available for reading.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> is non-zero, retry your receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>為非零，再試一次您接收作業。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will read as much data as is available up to the size of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會讀取到緩衝區的大小可用的資料量。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> method, and all available data has been received, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and return zero bytes.

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> will read the first enqueued datagram from the destination address you specify in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of the `buffer` parameter, `buffer` gets filled with the first part of the message, the excess data is lost and a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您接收的資料包大於大小`buffer`參數，`buffer`填入訊息的第一個部分，與過多的資料會遺失與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will read as much data as is available, up to the size of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會讀取到緩衝區的大小，可用的資料量。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> method, and all available data has been received, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and return zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>與連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>方法，以及所有可用的資料已經收到，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> will read the first enqueued datagram from the destination address you specify in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>會從您在中指定的目的地位址讀取第一個加入佇列資料包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of the `buffers` parameter, `buffers` gets filled with the first part of the message, the excess data is lost and a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您接收的資料包大於大小`buffers`參數，`buffers`填入訊息的第一個部分，與過多的資料會遺失與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to receive data on a connected <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何接收的資料連接的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffers" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffers" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="buffers" />.Count is zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffers" />.Count 為零。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: for accepting connections from the network.
trans-unit.target: 接受來自網路的連線。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Accept" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Accept" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that is the storage location for the received data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 型別的陣列，為收到資料的存放位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to receive.
trans-unit.target: 要接收的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: Receives the specified number of bytes of data from a bound <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> into a receive buffer, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />，從已繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 將指定位元組數的資料接收至接收緩衝區中。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: 收到的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method reads data into the `buffer` parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會讀取資料到`buffer`參數，並傳回成功讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> from both connection-oriented and connectionless sockets.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>從連線導向和無連線通訊端。

trans-unit.source: This overload only requires you to provide a receive buffer, the number of bytes you want to receive, and the necessary <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags>.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載只會要求您提供接收緩衝區中，您想要接收的位元組和必要數目<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags>。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> to establish a remote host connection, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> to accept an incoming connection prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>建立遠端主機連線，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>接受連入連線，然後才呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will only read data that arrives from the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法只會讀取來自遠端主機中建立資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, you can also use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您也可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> will allow you to receive data arriving from any host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> 可讓您接收資料抵達的任何主機。

trans-unit.source: If no data is available for reading, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will block until data is available, unless a time-out value was set by using <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料可供讀取，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會封鎖，直到資料可用，除非使用已設定的逾時值<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the time-out value was exceeded, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> call will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已超過逾時值，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>呼叫會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the in the protocol stack buffer, The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在未封鎖模式中，而且沒有使用中的資料通訊協定堆疊緩衝區<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，則擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> property to determine if data is available for reading.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> is non-zero, retry your receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>為非零，再試一次您接收作業。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will read as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會讀取可供使用，最多為指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> method, and all available data has been received, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and return zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>與連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>方法，以及所有可用的資料已經收到，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> will read the first queued datagram from the destination address you specify in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>會從您在中指定的目的地位址讀取第一個佇列的資料包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of the `buffer` parameter, `buffer` gets filled with the first part of the message, the excess data is lost and a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您接收的資料包大於大小`buffer`參數，`buffer`填入訊息的第一個部分，與過多的資料會遺失與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following receives the data found into `buffer`, and specifies <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.None> for <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags>.
trans-unit.target: 下列接收資料找到`buffer`，並指定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.None>如<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="size" /> exceeds the size of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 超過 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的大小。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: A caller in the call stack does not have the required permissions.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫堆疊中的呼叫端沒有所需的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: for accepting connections from the network.
trans-unit.target: 接受來自網路的連線。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Accept" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Accept" />。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.ArraySegment`1" />s of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the received data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ArraySegment`1" /> 型別的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 清單，包含已接收的資料。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError" /> object that stores the socket error.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError" /> 物件，儲存通訊端錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Receives data from a bound <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> into the list of receive buffers, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />，從已繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 接收資料至接收緩衝區清單中。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: 收到的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: This method reads data into the `buffers` parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讀取資料到`buffers`參數，並傳回成功讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: You can call from both connection-oriented and connectionless sockets.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從連線導向和無連線通訊端呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This overload requires you to provide one or more receive buffers.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載都需要您提供一個或多個接收緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags> value defaults to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.None>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags>值預設為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags.None>。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> to establish a remote host connection, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> to accept an incoming connection prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>建立遠端主機連線，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>接受連入連線，然後才呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will only read data that arrives from the remote host connection established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法只會讀取來自中建立的遠端主機連接的資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, you can also use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您也可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> will allow you to receive data arriving from any host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> 可讓您接收資料抵達的任何主機。

trans-unit.source: If no data is available for reading, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will block until data is available, unless a time-out value was set by using <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料可供讀取，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會封鎖，直到資料可用，除非使用已設定的逾時值<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the time-out value was exceeded, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> call throws a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已超過逾時值，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>呼叫會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the in the protocol stack buffer, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在未封鎖模式中，而且沒有使用中的資料通訊協定堆疊緩衝區<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，則擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> property to determine if data is available for reading.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> is non-zero, retry the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>為非零，接收作業的重試。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will read as much data as is available, up to the size of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會讀取到緩衝區的大小，可用的資料量。

trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>與連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>方法，以及所有可用的資料已經收到，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。

trans-unit.source: If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of the `buffers` parameter, `buffers` gets filled with the first part of the message, the excess data is lost and a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您接收的資料包大於大小`buffers`參數，`buffers`填入訊息的第一個部分，與過多的資料會遺失與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

<paramref name="buffers" />.Count is zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffers" />.Count 為零。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: for accepting connections from the network.
trans-unit.target: 接受來自網路的連線。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Accept" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkAccess.Accept" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that is the storage location for received data.
trans-unit.target: 類型 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 的陣列，此為接收資料的儲存位置。

trans-unit.source: The location in <c>buffer</c> to store the received data.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中存放已接收資料的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to receive.
trans-unit.target: 要接收的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: Receives the specified number of bytes from a bound <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> into the specified offset position of the receive buffer, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />，從已繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags" /> 將指定的位元組數接收到接收緩衝區的指定位移位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes received.
trans-unit.target: 收到的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method reads data into the buffer parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會將資料讀入緩衝區參數並傳回成功讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> from both connection-oriented and connectionless sockets.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>從連線導向和無連線通訊端。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> to establish a remote host connection, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> to accept an incoming connection prior to calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>建立遠端主機連線，或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>接受連入連線，然後才呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will only read data that arrives from the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法只會讀取來自遠端主機中建立資料<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Accept%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless protocol, you can also use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您也可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> will allow you to receive data arriving from any host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveFrom%2A> 可讓您接收資料抵達的任何主機。

trans-unit.source: If no data is available for reading, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will block until data is available, unless a time-out value was set by using <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料可供讀取，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會封鎖，直到資料可用，除非使用已設定的逾時值<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the time-out value was exceeded, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> call will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已超過逾時值，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>呼叫會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the in the protocol stack buffer, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在未封鎖模式中，而且沒有使用中的資料通訊協定堆疊緩衝區<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，則擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks below.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱下面的備註。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> property to determine if data is available for reading.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A> is non-zero, retry the receive operation.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Available%2A>為非零，接收作業的重試。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connection-oriented <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will read as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the size parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用連線導向<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>、<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會讀取可供使用，最多的 size 參數所指定的位元組數目的資料量。

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connection with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A> method, and all available data has been received, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> method will complete immediately and return zero bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端主機關機<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>與連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Shutdown%2A>方法，以及所有可用的資料已經收到，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a connectionless <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> will read the first queued datagram from the destination address you specify in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用無連線<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>會從您在中指定的目的地位址讀取第一個佇列的資料包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of the `buffer` parameter, `buffer` gets filled with the first part of the message, the excess data is lost and a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您接收的資料包大於大小`buffer`參數，`buffer`填入訊息的第一個部分，與過多的資料會遺失與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 錯誤的程式碼文件 MSDN library 中如需詳細的錯誤說明。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies a data buffer, an offset, a size, and a socket flag before receiving data on a connected <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例指定資料緩衝區、 位移、 大小和通訊端旗標才能接收資料，在連接上的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="size" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="buffer" /> minus the value of the <paramref name="offset" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="size" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度減去 <paramref name="offset" /> 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="socketFlags" /> is not a valid combination of values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="socketFlags" /> 不是有效的值組合。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint" /> property was not set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.LocalEndPoint" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An operating system error occurs while accessing the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 在存取 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 時發生作業系統錯誤。

trans-unit.target: 呼叫堆疊中的呼叫端沒有所需的使用權限。

trans-unit.target: 接受來自網路的連線。
